trans-unit.resname: J22·1 | Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier
trans-unit.target: 不朽士兵阿固寇斯

trans-unit.resname: J22·1 | Agrus Kos, Eternal Soldier | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes the target of an ability that targets only it, you may pay {1}{GU}. If you do, copy that ability for each other creature you control that ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. ({GU} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当CARDNAME成为异能的目标，且该异能仅以它为目标时，你可以支付{1}{R/W}。若你如此作，则该异能每能以一个由你操控的其他生物为目标，便将该异能复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些生物之一为目标，且不能重复选择。（{R/W}可用{R}或{W}来支付。）

trans-unit.source: Angelic Cub
trans-unit.target: 幼狮天使

trans-unit.resname: J22·2 | Angelic Cub | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.\nAs long as CARDNAME has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME每回合首度成为咒语或异能的目标时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 只要CARDNAME上有三个或更多+1/+1指示物，它便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chains of Custody
trans-unit.target: 监护锁链

trans-unit.resname: J22·3 | Chains of Custody | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.\nEnchanted creature has ward {2}. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。 所结附的生物具有守护{2}。（每当它成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.source: Distinguished Conjurer
trans-unit.target: 杰出咒法师

trans-unit.resname: J22·4 | Distinguished Conjurer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.\n{4}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。 {4}{W}，{T}：放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Ingenious Leonin
trans-unit.target: 狮族巧匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·5 | Ingenious Leonin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking creature you control. If that creature is a Cat, it gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}：在另一个目标由你操控且进行攻击的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果该生物是猫，则它获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Leonin claws were already deadly weapons of natural evolution before he improved upon them.
trans-unit.target: 在经他改进之前，自然进化就早已把狮族的利爪变成了致命的武器。

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 机械工程师莉塔

trans-unit.resname: J22·6 | Lita, Mechanical Engineer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nAt the beginning of your end step, untap each other artifact creature you control.\n{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 5/5 colorless Vehicle artifact token named Zeppelin with flying and crew 3. (It has "Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.")
trans-unit.target: 警戒 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控的其他神器生物。 {3}{W}，{T}：派出一个5/5无色，名称为飞艇的载具衍生神器，且具有飞行与搭载3。（它具有「横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。」）

trans-unit.source: Magnanimous Magistrate
trans-unit.target: 宽宏执政官

trans-unit.resname: J22·7 | Magnanimous Magistrate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with five reprieve counters on it.\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if its mana value was 1 or greater, you may remove that many reprieve counters from CARDNAME. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有五个免难指示物。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，若它的法术力值等于或大于1，则你可以从CARDNAME上移去等量的免难指示物。若你如此作，则将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: J22·8 | Preston, the Vanisher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 0/1 white Illusion.\n{1}{W}, Sacrifice five Illusions: Exile target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物在你操控下进战场时，若它未经施放，则派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，但它是0/1白色虚影。 {1}{W}，牺牲五个虚影：放逐目标非地永久物。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.\nWhenever you draw your fifth card each turn, CARDNAME and Drakes you control each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。 每当你抓每回合中你的第五张牌时，CARDNAME和由你操控的龙兽各得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, CARDNAME can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜3。（检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以将另一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。若你如此作，则CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: J22·11 | Hold for Questioning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature or planeswalker\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent and investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")\nEnchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或鹏洛客 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的永久物并探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。） 所结附的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置，且其起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isu the Abominable
trans-unit.target: 雪宝伊须

trans-unit.resname: J22·12 | Isu the Abominable | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may play snow lands and cast snow spells from the top of your library.\nWhenever another snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}, {W}, or {U}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶使用雪境地和施放雪境咒语。 每当另一个雪境永久物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{G}，{W}或{U}。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: If you would scry a number of cards, scry that many cards plus one instead.\n{3}{GW}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将占卜若干牌，则改为占卜该数量加一的牌。 {3}{G/U}：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果它是巨海兽，海怪，章鱼或巨蛇生物牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若你未将该牌放进战场，则你可以将它置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.\n{1}{U}, Exile CARDNAME from your graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {1}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Maintaining a personal bubble is even more important when you have gills.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有鳃，那维持个人气泡就显得尤为重要。

trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's a Pirate in addition to its other types and it has "Whenever this creature or another creature with the same name deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有海盗此类别，且具有「每当此生物或另一个与之同名的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Soul Read
trans-unit.target: 读取魂魄

trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.\n• Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。 •抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: It's easy to be two steps ahead when you can see their every thought.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能看清对手每道思绪，那么能预先考虑两步也并非难事。

trans-unit.source: Synchronized Eviction

trans-unit.resname: J22·18 | Synchronized Eviction | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control at least two creatures that share a creature type.\nPut target nonland permanent into its owner's library second from the top.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控至少两个具共通生物类别的生物，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。 将目标非地永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第二张的位置。

trans-unit.source: "I told you this one would be a handful."
trans-unit.target: 「我早就告诉你这家伙不好对付。」

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, other Rats you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Rats you control.\nAt the beginning of your end step, you may mill four cards. If you do, return up to two Rat creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击或阻挡时，由你操控的其他老鼠得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的老鼠数量。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以磨四张牌。若你如此作，则将至多两张老鼠生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 {B}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：它对每个其他生物和每位牌手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: J22·20 | Conductor of Cacophony | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only an imitation of tortured shrieking\n—or so the Rakdos claim.
trans-unit.target: 曲调只不过是听起来像受虐哀号而已～至少拉铎司人是这么说的。

trans-unit.resname: J22·21 | Creeping Bloodsucker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。你获得等同于以此法所造成的伤害之生命。

trans-unit.source: "If a vampire were feeding on you every night, wouldn't you have bite marks? Stop wasting my time."\n—Donya, village healer
trans-unit.target: 「如果是吸血鬼每晚都来吸你的血，那你至少会有牙印吧？别再浪费我的时间了。」 ～村庄治疗师唐娅

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，选择一项。如果你的总生命正好为13，则你可以两项都选。 •你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。 •放逐目标对手的坟墓场。该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·23 | Disciple of Perdition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Could you please spare some of your blood for my precious little tree?"
trans-unit.target: 「您能不能为我的宝贝小树捐点血？」

trans-unit.target: 藏骨堂老鼠

trans-unit.source: You know you've ventured too deep when the rats stop running and hold their ground.
trans-unit.target: 当老鼠不再逃窜而是站定蓄势时，你就已经追得太深。

When you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触，系命 每当你获得生命时，CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以支付{1}{W/B}。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值等于或小于X的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，X为你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: Skullslither Worm
trans-unit.target: 滑骨蠕虫

trans-unit.source: As larvae, they burrow into a host's brain to feed upon it, growing until they're large enough to burst free and seek out larger prey.
trans-unit.target: 它们在幼虫时期会潜伏宿主脑中汲取养分，待长到够大之后，就会钻破脑壳去寻找更大的猎物。

trans-unit.source: Suspicious Shambler
trans-unit.target: 可疑跛行怪

trans-unit.target: {4}{B}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：派出两个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: It was the perfect disguise—at least until its stomach started moaning.
trans-unit.target: 伪装得很完美～至少在肚子哀嚎前很完美。

trans-unit.target: {T}：在目标生物或鹏洛客上放置一个赏金指示物。只能于法术时机起动。 每当一个由对手操控且其上有赏金指示物的生物或鹏洛客受到伤害时，将其消灭。

trans-unit.source: "You sign. They die. Simple as that."
trans-unit.target: 「你签字。他会死。就是这么简单。」

trans-unit.source: Brazen Cannonade
trans-unit.target: 莽霸联盟炮击

trans-unit.resname: J22·31 | Brazen Cannonade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.\nRaid — At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you attacked with a creature this turn, exile the top card of your library. Until end of combat on your next turn, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且进行攻击的生物死去时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害。 突击～在你战斗后的行动阶段开始时，若你本回合中曾以生物攻击，则放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的战斗结束，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.source: The blacksmith forgot to feed the forge, so the forge fed itself.

trans-unit.source: Daring Piracy

trans-unit.source: Sky pirates often leap randomly into the fray and assume there will be something to land on.

trans-unit.source: Slonk was struck by lightning twenty-seven times before he got the idea. Another forty-three hits and he'd perfected it.

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may pay {1}{UR}. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent." (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，你可以支付{1}{U/R}。若你如此作，则复制该咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。如果该复制品是永久物咒语，则它获得敏捷与「在你的结束步骤开始时，牺牲此永久物。」（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: Ogre Battlecaster
trans-unit.target: 战咒食人魔

trans-unit.resname: J22·36 | Ogre Battlecaster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard by paying {R}{R} in addition to its other costs. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. When you cast that spell, CARDNAME gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放目标瞬间或法术牌，但在其他费用以外，还须额外支付{R}{R}。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。当你施放该咒语时，CARDNAME得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.source: You can gather a tidy fortune if you can avoid getting clobbered by falling treasure.

trans-unit.target: {T}：每位牌手各派出一个无色，名称为香蕉的衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加{R}或{G}。你获得2点生命。」 每当一个由对手操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，在每个由你操控且为猿猴或猴的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当奇博攻击时，防御牌手牺牲一个神器。

trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: In a Multiverse of endless possibilities, Aminatou decided to experience all of them.
trans-unit.target: 这片多重宇宙具有无限可能，而阿米娜图决定悉数体验一番。

trans-unit.source: Spectral Sailor
trans-unit.target: 魂魅船员

trans-unit.resname: J22·64 | Spectral Sailor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\n{3}{U}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 {3}{U}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Permission to haunt aboard, cap'n?"
trans-unit.target: 「报告船长，请准于船上作祟。」

trans-unit.source: Spellstutter Sprite
trans-unit.target: 纷咒仙灵

trans-unit.resname: J22·65 | Spellstutter Sprite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, counter target spell with mana value X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，反击目标法术力值等于或小于X的咒语，X为由你操控的仙灵数量。

trans-unit.source: Whirler Rogue
trans-unit.target: 旋翼浪客

trans-unit.resname: J22·66 | Whirler Rogue | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.\nTap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Diabolic Edict
trans-unit.target: 恶魔的勒令

trans-unit.resname: J22·67 | Diabolic Edict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: "Mere death brings no pleasure. Pleasure comes from watching fools scratch and claw to save their wretched lives from the inevitable."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「单单死亡无法让我愉悦。看着傻瓜们徒劳费劲，想让自己可悲生命逃离无可避免的结局，这才能让我感到愉悦。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: J22·68 | Feast on the Fallen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feast on the Fallen
trans-unit.target: 饱食死者

trans-unit.resname: J22·68 | Feast on the Fallen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, if an opponent lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，若有对手上回合中失去过生命，则在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·68 | Feast on the Fallen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He only paused to catch his breath, not knowing that it would be his last.
trans-unit.target: 他只是停下来想喘口气，未曾料到这是他的最后一口气。

trans-unit.resname: J22·69 | Lord of the Accursed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord of the Accursed
trans-unit.target: 遭诅者领主

trans-unit.resname: J22·69 | Lord of the Accursed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.\n{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他灵俑得+1/+1。 {1}{B}，{T}：所有灵俑获得威慑异能直到回合结束。（具威慑异能的生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·69 | Lord of the Accursed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To die for a cause and continue to serve it is the truest mark of loyalty."
trans-unit.target: 「鞠躬尽瘁、死后不已，才真正算是忠诚。」

trans-unit.source: Oathsworn Vampire
trans-unit.target: 立誓吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: J22·70 | Oathsworn Vampire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nYou may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 如果你本回合中获得过生命，则你可以从你的坟墓场中施放CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Neither time nor death could keep me from upholding our pact."
trans-unit.target: 「我们的契约必得履行，时间和死亡都无法阻止。」

trans-unit.source: Ogre Slumlord
trans-unit.target: 贫窟霸食人魔

trans-unit.resname: J22·71 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.\nRats you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。 由你操控的老鼠具有死触异能。

trans-unit.source: "'Rat-infested' sounds so negative. I prefer 'rat-friendly.'"
trans-unit.target: 「『鼠患』听起来太负面了。我喜欢说『鼠欢』。」

trans-unit.source: Plaguecrafter
trans-unit.target: 播疫师

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客。每位无法如此作的牌手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Looks like I need a new test subject. Any volunteers?"
trans-unit.target: 「看来我需要新的实验对象。有志愿者吗？」

trans-unit.source: Stitcher's Supplier
trans-unit.target: 拼接师备尸

trans-unit.resname: J22·73 | Stitcher's Supplier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或死去时，磨三张牌。（将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: "Let me give you a hand. He won't be needing it; he's left-handed. Also dead."
trans-unit.target: 「给你出个手帮忙。他用不上；他是左撇子，而且还死了。」

trans-unit.source: Tragic Slip
trans-unit.target: 悲剧失足

trans-unit.resname: J22·74 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nMorbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: She never would've guessed that her last word would be "Whoops!"
trans-unit.target: 她从未想到自己的遗言居然是「哎呀！」

trans-unit.resname: J22·75 | Tree of Perdition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tree of Perdition
trans-unit.target: 浩劫之树

trans-unit.resname: J22·75 | Tree of Perdition | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{T}: Exchange target opponent's life total with CARDNAME's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {T}：将目标对手的总生命与CARDNAME的防御力交换。

trans-unit.resname: J22·75 | Tree of Perdition | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Trees are to be venerated and protected . . . except that one."\n—Marel, Dawnhart witch
trans-unit.target: 「树木应受敬仰和保护…那一棵除外。」 ～曙鹿集女巫玛芮尔

trans-unit.source: Dragon Fodder
trans-unit.target: 巨龙食粮

trans-unit.resname: J22·76 | Dragon Fodder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Gront realized that his brilliant plan of being faster than Kork might still not be enough.
trans-unit.target: 格隆特发现自己「只要比喀罗克快就行」的绝妙计划好像还是不行。

trans-unit.source: Dragon Mage
trans-unit.target: 巨龙法师

trans-unit.resname: J22·77 | Dragon Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，每位牌手弃掉其手牌，然后各抓七张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I've forgotten more spells than you will ever know."
trans-unit.target: 「我忘掉的咒语比你能学会的还多。」

trans-unit.source: Drannith Stinger
trans-unit.target: 卓尼斯术击师

trans-unit.resname: J22·78 | Drannith Stinger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cycle another card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.\nCycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你循环另一张牌时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。 循环{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: "If you're going to run for cover, you should start now."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你打算找地方躲，现在就该去了。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·79 | Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
trans-unit.target: 裂镜奇奇几奇

trans-unit.resname: J22·79 | Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\n{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 {T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控且非传奇的生物之复制品，但它具有敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: J22·79 | Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wanna see a neat trick?"
trans-unit.target: 「想不想看个妙招？」

trans-unit.source: Rapacious Dragon
trans-unit.target: 贪宝巨龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·80 | Rapacious Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个珍宝衍生物。（它们是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: It wasn't the first time the dragon's hoard had attracted a free lunch.
trans-unit.target: 巨龙宝藏会引来免费午餐，这早不是第一次了。

trans-unit.source: Rigging Runner
trans-unit.target: 索具奔越者

trans-unit.resname: J22·81 | Rigging Runner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nRaid — CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 突击～如果你本回合中攻击过，则CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Prepare to be boarded! Or don't. I'm coming over either way."
trans-unit.target: 「做好准备吧，我要登舰了！不准备也无所谓，反正我都会来。」

trans-unit.source: Spear Spewer
trans-unit.target: 击矛手

trans-unit.resname: J22·82 | Spear Spewer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {T}：CARDNAME对每位牌手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Okay, maybe the 962nd spear will be the one that gets 'em!"\n—Kreech, ballista operator
trans-unit.target: 「行吧，也许第962根矛就能射中了！」 ～巨弩操作员克力奇

trans-unit.source: Thermo-Alchemist
trans-unit.target: 热力炼金术士

trans-unit.source: Defender\n{T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {T}：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Bow before the power of *science*!"
trans-unit.target: 「向*科学*之力屈服吧！」

trans-unit.resname: J22·84 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thrill of Possibility
trans-unit.target: 快意拼搏

trans-unit.resname: J22·84 | Thrill of Possibility | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·84 | Thrill of Possibility | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Reality is always much duller and grayer than what your imagination can conjure."
trans-unit.target: 「现实永远比你想象的要阴晦黑暗得多。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·85 | Arlinn, Voice of the Pack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
trans-unit.target: 狼群之声雅琳

trans-unit.resname: J22·85 | Arlinn, Voice of the Pack | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.\n−2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且为狼或狼人的生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。 −2：派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Caustic Caterpillar
trans-unit.target: 腐蚀毛虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·86 | Caustic Caterpillar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: "That was a Consulate spy thopter. Leave the caterpillar to its meal."\n—Pia Nalaar, renegade inventor
trans-unit.target: 「那是执政院的间谍振翼机。让毛虫安心吃饭吧。」 ～乱匠发明家琵雅纳拉

trans-unit.source: Colossal Majesty
trans-unit.target: 巨兽扬威

trans-unit.resname: J22·87 | Colossal Majesty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Wow, it's even *bigger* than I thought! Awesome!"
trans-unit.target: 「哇，它比我想的*大多了*！真棒！」

trans-unit.source: Elvish Rejuvenator
trans-unit.target: 回春妖精

trans-unit.resname: J22·88 | Elvish Rejuvenator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌横置放进战场。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: "As long as its roots still reach the soil, I can heal it."
trans-unit.target: 「只要它的根还接着土壤，我就能治好它。」

trans-unit.source: Hydra's Growth
trans-unit.target: 多头龙式生长

trans-unit.resname: J22·89 | Hydra's Growth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，在所结附的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 在你的维持开始时，将所结附的生物上之+1/+1指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.resname: J22·90 | Khalni Heart Expedition | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Khalni Heart Expedition
trans-unit.target: 坎尼之心探险

trans-unit.resname: J22·90 | Khalni Heart Expedition | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nRemove three quest counters from CARDNAME and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去三个探索指示物并牺牲它：从你牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Ram Through
trans-unit.target: 轰然撞倒

trans-unit.resname: J22·91 | Ram Through | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。如果该由你操控的生物具有践踏异能，则过量伤害改为对后者生物的操控者造成之。

trans-unit.source: The castle's mages had devised effective counters to every form of siegecraft, but had no answers to gorilla warfare.
trans-unit.target: 城堡的法师对每种攻城方式都有完善应变之策，唯独大猩猩作战无解。

trans-unit.source: Thrashing Brontodon
trans-unit.target: 痛击霆伟龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·92 | Thrashing Brontodon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: "Count yourself lucky it only broke your kitesail. Get that close to the nest again and it'll be your face."\n—Huatli
trans-unit.target: 「你算幸运了，它只砸烂你的航筝。要再这么靠近巢穴，下次就是砸你的脸。」 ～华特莉

trans-unit.source: World Breaker
trans-unit.target: 毁世恶体

trans-unit.resname: J22·93 | World Breaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When you cast this spell, exile target artifact, enchantment, or land.
Reach
{2}{C}, Sacrifice a land: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. ({C} represents colorless mana.)
trans-unit.target: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。） 当你施放此咒语时，放逐目标神器，结界或地。 延势 {2}{C}，牺牲一个地：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（{C}代表无色法术力。）

trans-unit.source: Coldsteel Heart
trans-unit.target: 寒钢核心

trans-unit.resname: J22·94 | Coldsteel Heart | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.\n{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。 {T}：加一点该色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: "There is as much power in winter's chill as in summer's warmth."
trans-unit.target: 「冬天寒气蕴含之力和夏日温暖里的一样多。」

trans-unit.source: Magnifying Glass
trans-unit.target: 放大镜

trans-unit.resname: J22·95 | Magnifying Glass | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {4}，{T}：探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Palmistry is much more effective when you read the fine print.
trans-unit.target: 看手相与读细则一样要盯个明白。

trans-unit.source: Peacewalker Colossus
trans-unit.target: 护宁巨像

trans-unit.resname: J22·96 | Peacewalker Colossus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.\nCrew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}：另一个目标由你操控的载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。 搭载4（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于4的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.source: One way to keep the peace is to make war look like a really bad idea.
trans-unit.target: 令人感觉战无可胜，也是维护和平的手段之一。

trans-unit.source: Karn Liberated
trans-unit.target: 重获自由的卡恩

trans-unit.resname: J22·97 | Karn Liberated | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.\n−3: Exile target permanent.\n−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with CARDNAME. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: +4：目标牌手从其手上放逐一张牌。 −3：放逐目标永久物。 −14：重新开始游戏，但将所有以CARDNAME放逐之非灵气永久物牌留在放逐区。然后将这些牌在你的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Task Force
trans-unit.target: 特遣部队

trans-unit.resname: J22·113 | Task Force | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，它得+0/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Keeping the streets of the Sixth District safe, one escaped Simic mutant at a time.
trans-unit.target: 保护第六区街道的安全，一次对付一个析米克在逃突变体。

trans-unit.source: Rhystic Study
trans-unit.target: 琉晶研究

trans-unit.resname: J22·114 | Rhystic Study | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I'll teach you the leyline paratrigonometrics, no problem. But you need to show me how to make that fiery swirly thing."\n—Zimone, to Rootha
trans-unit.target: 「没问题，我可以教你地脉对三角学。但你得告诉我怎么画出那道火热涡旋。」 ～琦梦答应如莎

trans-unit.source: Tragic Lesson
trans-unit.target: 悲痛教训

trans-unit.resname: J22·115 | Tragic Lesson | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。然后除非你将一个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上，否则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Eventually, the school would resort to hiring a kraken to guard the more dangerous tomes in the Biblioplex.
trans-unit.target: 最终，学校只能雇佣巨海兽来守卫茂典阁里更危险的巨著。

trans-unit.source: Wizard Mentor
trans-unit.target: 魔法教师

trans-unit.resname: J22·116 | Wizard Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Return CARDNAME and target creature you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将CARDNAME和目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "I hope you took notes before it exploded."
trans-unit.target: 「希望你有在它爆裂之前做笔记。」

trans-unit.source: Blood Artist
trans-unit.target: 鲜血画家

trans-unit.resname: J22·117 | Blood Artist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个生物死去时，目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "No! It's all wrong! I need more. Bring me more!"
trans-unit.target: 「不对！全都不对！再多点。再给我多找点来！」

trans-unit.resname: J22·118 | Feast of Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feast of Blood
trans-unit.target: 鲜血盛宴

trans-unit.resname: J22·118 | Feast of Blood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.\nDestroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 只能于你操控两个或更多吸血鬼时施放此咒语。 消灭目标生物。你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·118 | Feast of Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The best part of a wedding is the cutting of the cake, followed closely by the cutting of the cake decorator."\n—Olivia Voldaren
trans-unit.target: 「婚礼最精彩的环节非切蛋糕莫属，不过切蛋糕上的装饰也不错。」 ～奥莉薇亚沃达连

trans-unit.source: Festering Evil
trans-unit.target: 邪恶溃伤

trans-unit.resname: J22·119 | Festering Evil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.\n{B}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME对每个生物和每位牌手各造成1点伤害。 {B}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：它对每个生物和每位牌手各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Evil is never absent, only hidden.
trans-unit.target: 邪恶永不缺席，只是暂时躲了起来。

trans-unit.source: Ghoul's Feast
trans-unit.target: 食尸鬼盛宴

trans-unit.resname: J22·120 | Ghoul's Feast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.source: "Sumptuous, carefully fermented, and served with a silky ocular puree. You simply must try a bite."\n—Varina, Lich Queen
trans-unit.target: 「主菜十分丰盛，经过悉心发酵，且配有丝滑眼泥。你一定要尝一口。」 ～巫妖女王瓦理娜

trans-unit.source: Morkrut Banshee
trans-unit.target: 穆坎女妖

trans-unit.resname: J22·121 | Morkrut Banshee | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Morbid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中有生物死去，则目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: She wails for those who have died, and for those who are about to.
trans-unit.target: 她为已逝者痛哭，也为将死者哀嚎。

trans-unit.source: Nezumi Bone-Reader
trans-unit.target: 骨经鼠人

trans-unit.resname: J22·122 | Nezumi Bone-Reader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：目标牌手弃一张牌。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: "The old ways still work, but a little tech support never hurts."
trans-unit.target: 「老方法还管用，但一些技术支援也无伤大雅。」

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Plaguelord
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚疫病王

trans-unit.resname: J22·123 | Phyrexian Plaguelord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.\nSacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。 牺牲一个生物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Even after death, a wealth of serviceable biomass remains."\n—Phyrexian progress notes
trans-unit.target: 「死亡之后仍有大量生物质可加以利用。」 ～非瑞克西亚进展纪录

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的矫治

trans-unit.resname: J22·124 | Phyrexian Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，支付2点生命：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Your sacrifice has been noted and deemed insufficient."\n—Qal-Sha, priest of Norn
trans-unit.target: 「我们会铭记你的牺牲，但仍稍显不足。」 ～艾蕾侬僧侣刻沙

trans-unit.source: Reassembling Skeleton
trans-unit.target: 重组骷髅妖

trans-unit.resname: J22·125 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "I can't bear to watch these things put themselves back together, Geralf. They remind me of the time you tried to cut your own hair: a tragic abomination!"\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「这些家伙把自己拼凑回去的样子实在让我看不下去啊，基拉夫。简直就是你那次给自己剪头发的模样：又惨又丑！」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: Renegade Demon
trans-unit.target: 反叛恶魔

trans-unit.source: Trapped in Immersturm, it bloodies its blade not for ideals or territory or power, but simply to pass the time.
trans-unit.target: 它受困无尽风暴境域中，不断用鲜血染红刀刃～不为理想，不为领土，也不为力量，只是为了打发时间。

trans-unit.resname: J22·127 | Swarm of Bloodflies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swarm of Bloodflies
trans-unit.target: 血蝇虫群

trans-unit.resname: J22·127 | Swarm of Bloodflies | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 每当另一个生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·127 | Swarm of Bloodflies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Despite the name, they'll happily devour the flesh too.
trans-unit.target: 虽然名为血蝇，但也很乐意吃肉。

trans-unit.source: Wakedancer
trans-unit.target: 醒夜舞者

trans-unit.source: Morbid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中有生物死去，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Havengul wakes are widely regarded as great entertainment. If you're lucky, the guest of honor climbs out of the casket and joins in the festivities.
trans-unit.target: 海温古醒夜祭公认是最佳娱乐庆典。如果你够幸运，主宾会从棺材里爬出来一同狂欢。

trans-unit.source: Aftershock
trans-unit.target: 余震

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，生物或地。CARDNAME对你造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Deciding the house's ownership through a wizard duel had sounded like a brilliant idea at the time.
trans-unit.target: 通过魔法决斗来决定房子的归属，当时听来是个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Fireslinger
trans-unit.target: 掷焰手

trans-unit.source: {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害，且对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The most successful entertainers on New Capenna feature an element of medium-to-extreme danger in their acts.
trans-unit.target: 新卡佩纳最成功的演员，其表演都带有中度到极端的危险元素。

trans-unit.source: Flameblade Adept
trans-unit.target: 焰刃专家

trans-unit.resname: J22·131 | Flameblade Adept | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nWhenever you cycle or discard a card, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 每当你循环或弃一张牌时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The time for training was done. Only one final trial stood between Amin and his place among the honored dead.
trans-unit.target: 训练都已经完成。阿明只需通过最后一个祀炼就能光荣赴死。

trans-unit.resname: J22·132 | Ruin in Their Wake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ruin in Their Wake
trans-unit.target: 过境留痕

trans-unit.resname: J22·132 | Ruin in Their Wake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Devoid (This card has no color.)\nSearch your library for a basic land card and reveal it. You may put that card onto the battlefield tapped if you control a land named Wastes. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。） 从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌并展示之。如果你操控名称为荒野的地，则你可以将该牌横置放进战场。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Uktabi Orangutan
trans-unit.target: 乌克塔比长臂猿

trans-unit.resname: J22·133 | Uktabi Orangutan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.source: The hierarchy of the Uktabi Jungle hinges mostly on who can keep Prince Kibo entertained.
trans-unit.target: 乌克塔比丛林的阶级划分，主要取决于谁能一直逗乐奇博王子。

trans-unit.source: Wicked Wolf
trans-unit.target: 恶狼

trans-unit.resname: J22·134 | Wicked Wolf | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.\nSacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它与至多一个目标不由你操控的生物互斗。 牺牲一个食品：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得不灭异能直到回合结束。将之横置。

trans-unit.source: Clockwork Hydra
trans-unit.target: 发条多头龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·135 | Clockwork Hydra | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.\n{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。 每当CARDNAME攻击或阻挡时，从其上移去一个+1/+1指示物。若你如此作，则CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Spawning Pit
trans-unit.target: 孳虫尸坑

trans-unit.resname: J22·136 | Spawning Pit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{1}, Remove two charge counters from CARDNAME: Create a 2/2 colorless Spawn artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {1}，从CARDNAME上移去两个充电指示物：派出一个2/2无色后裔衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Nothing is wasted on New Phyrexia.
trans-unit.target: 在新非瑞克西亚，什么都不会浪费。

trans-unit.source: Leechridden Swamp
trans-unit.target: 遍蛭沼泽

trans-unit.resname: J22·137 | Leechridden Swamp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {B}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate only if you control two or more black permanents.
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{B}。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {B}，{T}：每位对手各失去1点生命。只能于你操控两个或更多黑色永久物时起动。

trans-unit.source: Acrobatic Maneuver
trans-unit.target: 杂耍计略

trans-unit.resname: J22·138 | Acrobatic Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Renegades find ever more creative ways to work around the Consulate's aether regulations.
trans-unit.target: 乱匠迭出奇招以规避执政院的乙太法规。

trans-unit.source: Aerial Modification
trans-unit.target: 翔空改装

trans-unit.resname: J22·139 | Aerial Modification | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature or Vehicle\nAs long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或载具 只要所结附的永久物是载具，它便额外具有生物此类别。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Aethershield Artificer
trans-unit.target: 乙太盾神器师

trans-unit.resname: J22·140 | Aethershield Artificer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的神器生物得+2/+2且获得不灭异能。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.source: Most smiths shape metal, but some prefer more delicate materials.
trans-unit.target: 大多数工匠都在打造金属，但有些则偏好使用更精巧的原料。

trans-unit.resname: J22·141 | Ajani, Strength of the Pride | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ajani, Strength of the Pride
trans-unit.target: 狮群之力阿耶尼

trans-unit.resname: J22·141 | Ajani, Strength of the Pride | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.\n−2: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."\n0: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile CARDNAME and each artifact and creature your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: +1：你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控的生物数量与由你操控的鹏洛客数量之总和。 −2：派出一个2/2白色，名称为阿耶尼的群伴之猫／士兵衍生生物，且具有「每当你获得生命时，在阿耶尼的群伴上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」 0：如果你的总生命比你的起始总生命至少多15点，则放逐CARDNAME和所有由对手操控的神器与生物。

trans-unit.source: Ajani's Pridemate
trans-unit.target: 阿耶尼的群伴

trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."\n—Jazal Goldmane
trans-unit.target: 「只要一个享福，整群都能享福。」 ～金鬃贾佐

trans-unit.target: 丰穰蔻灵

trans-unit.target: 系命 {1}，牺牲CARDNAME：选择一种颜色。目标由你操控的生物或结界获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·143 | Alseid of Life's Bounty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dawn-kissed, he nourishes the golden grain."\n—Psemilla, Meletian poet
trans-unit.target: 「他挥洒晨光，滋养世间谷物。」 ～迈勒提斯诗人普塞弥拉

trans-unit.target: 洁羽天使

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的维持开始时，将目标精怪牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: J22·144 | Angel of Flight Alabaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She endures without Avacyn but secretly asks each soul she guides if they have seen her.
trans-unit.target: 她能撑得过艾维欣消失的现况，但依旧会私下逐一询问所引导的灵魂是否见过她。

trans-unit.source: Angelic Edict
trans-unit.target: 天使勒令

trans-unit.resname: J22·145 | Angelic Edict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物或结界。

trans-unit.source: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯建立了一座空中牢狱，俄佐立的法规在此处无法约束其正义感。

trans-unit.source: Angelic Page
trans-unit.target: 天使信差

trans-unit.source: Flying\n{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {T}：目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.
trans-unit.target: 但愿所有消息都如其传令般美好。

trans-unit.source: Angelic Protector
trans-unit.target: 天国守护使

trans-unit.resname: J22·147 | Angelic Protector | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, CARDNAME gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，CARDNAME得+0/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「在她的光芒笼罩下，我的家人获得了庇护，而黑暗却不死心地等待着。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.resname: J22·148 | Anointer of Valor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anointer of Valor
trans-unit.target: 勇气赐圣使

He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.\n−15: Exile all other permanents.

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你施放的灵气咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: "The first griffins were made by the gods to capture falling stars; they were given the keenest eyes and the swiftest wings, and sent to keep watch above the clouds."\n—*The Cosmogony*
trans-unit.target: 「诸神想要阻止流星再度坠地，便创造了狮鹫行守护之责；他们赋予狮鹫锐利双目与疾速翅膀，令其驻守云端随时戒备。」 ～*《天地起源论》*

trans-unit.source: Triplicate Spirits
trans-unit.target: 三联精怪

trans-unit.resname: J22·258 | Triplicate Spirits | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nCreate three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。） 派出三个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Trove Warden
trans-unit.target: 宝库护卫

trans-unit.resname: J22·259 | Trove Warden | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, put each permanent card exiled with it onto the battlefield under the control of that card's owner.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 当CARDNAME死去时，将所有以其放逐的永久物牌在各自拥有者的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Unquestioned Authority
trans-unit.target: 至上权威

trans-unit.resname: J22·260 | Unquestioned Authority | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature has protection from creatures.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 所结附的生物具有反生物保护异能。

trans-unit.source: "Only the Ancestor should be revered."\n—Mystic heretic
trans-unit.target: 「唯有圣祖灵得无上尊崇。」 ～秘教异端

trans-unit.source: Valkyrie Harbinger
trans-unit.target: 先兆女武神

trans-unit.resname: J22·261 | Valkyrie Harbinger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink\nAt the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过4点或更多生命，则派出一个4/4白色，具飞行与警戒异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Where she flies, the Light of Starnheim shines.
trans-unit.target: 她翅翼所及，便是斯达海姆光芒耀威之地。

trans-unit.resname: J22·262 | Valor in Akros | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Valor in Akros
trans-unit.target: 阿喀洛斯骁勇

trans-unit.resname: J22·262 | Valor in Akros | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·262 | Valor in Akros | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.
trans-unit.target: 勇猛同伴更胜坚厚铠甲。

trans-unit.source: Valorous Stance
trans-unit.target: 英勇以对

trans-unit.resname: J22·263 | Valorous Stance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)\n• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。） •消灭目标防御力等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.source: Valorous Steed
trans-unit.target: 英勇角驹

trans-unit.source: A unicorn chooses only the most virtuous and noble of knights to be its companion.
trans-unit.target: 骑士中唯有至德至尚者，才能被独角兽选作伙伴。

trans-unit.target: 良知重荷

trans-unit.resname: J22·265 | Weight of Conscience | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack.\nTap two untapped creatures you control that share a creature type: Exile enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物不能攻击。 横置两个由你操控且具共通生物类别的未横置生物：放逐所结附的生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·265 | Weight of Conscience | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes the weight of the world on your shoulders is a literal one.
trans-unit.target: 有时「双肩如荷世界之重」不只是夸饰法。

trans-unit.source: Wispweaver Angel
trans-unit.target: 编缕天使

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Academy Journeymage
trans-unit.target: 学院老练法师

trans-unit.resname: J22·267 | Academy Journeymage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控法术师，则此咒语减少{1}来施放。 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标由对手操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "We don't choose who comes here. We choose how long they stay."
trans-unit.target: 「造访此地与否由人们决定。在此停留多久由我们决定。」

trans-unit.source: Aeronaut Tinkerer
trans-unit.target: 空行修补匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·268 | Aeronaut Tinkerer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has flying as long as you control an artifact.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控神器，CARDNAME便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "All tinkerers have their heads in the clouds. I don't intend to stop there."
trans-unit.target: 「所有的修补匠都在异想天开。可我不想只能开天。」

trans-unit.source: Amoeboid Changeling
trans-unit.target: 阿米巴化形

trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌是所有生物类别。） {T}：目标生物获得所有生物类别直到回合结束。 {T}：目标生物失去所有生物类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 钉入乙太

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)\n{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1蓝色，具辟邪异能的人鱼衍生生物。（它们不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。） {3}{U}：目标人鱼本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Artificer's Epiphany
trans-unit.target: 神器师的顿悟

trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。如果你未操控神器，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The artificers of Kaladesh strive ceaselessly for perfection, progress, and the ultimate expression of elegance.
trans-unit.target: 卡拉德许神器师为求完美、创新、至上典雅而不断钻研求精。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜3。（检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.target: {2}：目标由你操控的雪境地成为4/4，具辟邪与敏捷异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。（具辟邪异能的生物不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: "They say perfection is unattainable, but they said that about flight too."
trans-unit.target: 「他们口口声声说完美不可及，但他们之前对飞行也是这态度。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多另一个目标生物或鹏洛客移回其拥有者手上。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有永久物从战场置于你手上，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·276 | Barrin, Tolarian Archmage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There is no age at which you stop learning."
trans-unit.target: 「没有老到学不动的时候。」

trans-unit.source: Berg Strider

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. If {S} was spent to cast this spell, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的神器或生物。如果施放此咒语时支付过{S}，则该永久物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。（{S}为产自雪境来源的法术力。）

trans-unit.target: 闪现 每当你在对手的回合中施放咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "I always attack from where their spyglasses can't see."

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.\nPut target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语以进行攻击的生物为目标，则它减少{2}来施放。 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第二张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: J22·279 | Bury in Books | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There are no weapons allowed in the Biblioplex, but a clever mage is never truly defenseless.
trans-unit.target: 茂典阁禁止携入兵器，但聪明的法师从不会毫无防备。

trans-unit.source: Chillerpillar
trans-unit.target: 冰寒毛虫

trans-unit.source: {4}{S}{S}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is monstrous, it has flying.
trans-unit.target: {4}{S}{S}：蛮化2。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。{S}能以产自雪境来源的一点法术力来支付。） 只要CARDNAME已蛮化，它便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: From its cocoon, a flurry takes flight.
trans-unit.target: 破茧而出，扑翼扬寒。

trans-unit.target: 冰寒陷阱

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。如果你操控法术师，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Serves you right for rushing ahead."\n—Kaliea, Sea Gate trapfinder
trans-unit.target: 「叫你往前冲，活该。」 ～海户探陷人卡理耶

trans-unit.target: 睥睨

trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{X}，否则反击之。占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: "Shame we'll never see what all the fuss was about."

trans-unit.target: 只要你操控人鱼，此咒语便具有闪现异能。 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: In the silence of the ice, even dreams become still.
trans-unit.target: 寒冰无言，就连梦境也随之静止。

trans-unit.source: Cryptic Serpent
trans-unit.target: 隐密巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: J22·285 | Cryptic Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.
trans-unit.target: 它能绕过感官，束缩感觉并毒害感知。

trans-unit.source: Dismiss
trans-unit.target: 退散

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."\n—Ertai, wizard adept
trans-unit.target: 「无论你做什么，我都能轻松地加以抹消。」 ～魔法专家尔泰

trans-unit.resname: J22·287 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djinn of Wishes
trans-unit.target: 祈愿巨灵

trans-unit.resname: J22·287 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.\n{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from CARDNAME: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个祈愿指示物。 {2}{U}{U}，从CARDNAME上移去一个祈愿指示物：展示你的牌库顶牌。你可以使用该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未如此作，则将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Drag Under
trans-unit.target: 拖入汪洋

trans-unit.resname: J22·288 | Drag Under | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.
trans-unit.target: 有些人驾船逃离日愈加剧的噩梦。那些船的残骸如今散落在涅非利亚海岸边。

trans-unit.source: Drownyard Explorers
trans-unit.target: 沉船地探险家

trans-unit.resname: J22·289 | Drownyard Explorers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: "Angels and inquisitors terrorize villages, but no one seems to notice the stirring out at sea."
trans-unit.target: 「村庄被天使和审判官弄得人心惶惶，但似乎没有人注意到海中异动。」

trans-unit.source: Elite Instructor

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The greatest minds in Meletis study under the masters at the Dekatia, a renowned school of magic and philosophy.
trans-unit.target: 得卡提亚学院是教导魔法与哲理的知名学府，迈勒提斯最顶尖的智者都云集于此拜师深造。

trans-unit.source: Erdwal Illuminator

trans-unit.resname: J22·291 | Erdwal Illuminator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you investigate for the first time each turn, investigate an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你每回合首度探查时，额外探查一次。

trans-unit.source: "When all else fails, follow the geist's lantern."\n—Vallon, Thraben inspector
trans-unit.target: 「走投无路时，就跟随游魂的明灯。」 ～瑟班巡检官瓦隆

trans-unit.source: Eternity Snare
trans-unit.target: 恒久绊索

trans-unit.resname: J22·292 | Eternity Snare | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Eyekite
trans-unit.target: 巨眼兽

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME gets +2/+0 as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要你本回合已抓两张或更多牌，CARDNAME便得+2/+0。

trans-unit.source: "This one will need direction. After all, each of its eyes is larger than its brain."\n—Cyla, Lord of the Aerie
trans-unit.target: 「这小家伙需要你为它指往哪边飞。毕竟它的脑子比任何一只眼睛都要小。」 ～羽巢之王塞拉

trans-unit.source: Faerie Formation
trans-unit.target: 仙灵兵阵

If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: In every swirl of the tide, it sees the awakening of things yet to come.
trans-unit.target: 它从周遭每一道浪潮漩涡当中，看到未来事物逐渐苏醒。

trans-unit.resname: J22·330 | One With the Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: One With the Wind
trans-unit.target: 御风而行

trans-unit.resname: J22·330 | One With the Wind | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: J22·330 | One With the Wind | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "River and sea, jungle and sky. Water flows freely between the two halves of the world. We are creatures of the water."\n—Shaper Tuvasa
trans-unit.target: 「河流入海，丛林蔽天。水能够在世界的两半之间自由流动。我族正是依水而生。」 ～塑形师吐瓦萨

trans-unit.source: Oneirophage
trans-unit.target: 噬梦蛸

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你抓一张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: It manifests at wizard academies to siphon inspiration from young prodigies.
trans-unit.target: 它常常现身法师学院，汲取青年逸才脑中灵感。

trans-unit.source: Opt
trans-unit.target: 抉择

trans-unit.source: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Sometimes the hardest choice is between two wonders."\n—Gadwick, the Wizened
trans-unit.target: 「有时候，在两个奇迹中作选择才最困难。」 ～老年法师盖威克

trans-unit.source: Overwhelmed Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 过负学徒

trans-unit.resname: J22·333 | Overwhelmed Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent mills two cards. Then you scry 2. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. To scry 2, look at the top two cards card of your library, then then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各磨两张牌。然后你占卜2。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: Perilous Voyage
trans-unit.target: 险恶旅程

trans-unit.resname: J22·334 | Perilous Voyage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 2 or less, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果其法术力值等于或小于2，则占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: For the first time in her life, Vraska tried to prevent death.
trans-unit.target: 这是瓦丝卡有生以来第一次想要救人活命。

trans-unit.source: Pestermite
trans-unit.target: 恼人鬼

trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以横置或重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.
trans-unit.target: 仙儿很清楚自己讨人厌。那正是他们现身的原因。

trans-unit.source: Pilfering Hawk
trans-unit.target: 偷窃翔鹰

trans-unit.resname: J22·336 | Pilfering Hawk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{S}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {S}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。（{S}能以产自雪境来源的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: "Well, at least it left us a mouse in exchange. Er . . . ugh . . . make that half a mouse."\n—Binhald, Beskir veteran
trans-unit.target: 「好吧，至少它还留了只老鼠当作交换。呃…呕…是半只老鼠。」 ～贝斯奇老兵宾哈德

trans-unit.resname: J22·337 | Press for Answers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Press for Answers
trans-unit.target: 强求解答

trans-unit.resname: J22·337 | Press for Answers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\nInvestigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Renowned Weaponsmith
trans-unit.target: 享誉兵匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·338 | Renowned Weaponsmith | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.\n{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。 {U}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张名称为穿心弓或龙炎瓶的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: River Sneak
trans-unit.target: 河流偷袭客

trans-unit.resname: J22·339 | River Sneak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.\nWhenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 每当另一个人鱼在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: No ripples, no splashes, no warning.
trans-unit.target: 没有涟漪，没有水花，没有警告。

trans-unit.resname: J22·340 | Sage of the Falls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sage of the Falls
trans-unit.target: 瀑布智者

trans-unit.resname: J22·340 | Sage of the Falls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another non-Human creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个非人类生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·340 | Sage of the Falls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ask a merfolk even a simple question and the answer is a journey far beyond the known.
trans-unit.target: 哪怕只是抱着简单问题，只要你虚心向人鱼请教，对方的回答也能带你领略超凡旅程。

trans-unit.resname: J22·341 | Sage's Row Savant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sage's Row Savant
trans-unit.target: 智者街学者

trans-unit.resname: J22·341 | Sage's Row Savant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·341 | Sage's Row Savant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.
trans-unit.target: 如今拉尼卡大街小巷到处都是公会离脱成员，滥用专业技能牟取私利。

trans-unit.source: Saltwater Stalwart
trans-unit.target: 海生壮汉

trans-unit.resname: J22·342 | Saltwater Stalwart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME向任一对手造成伤害时，目标牌手抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.
trans-unit.target: 每次攻势都考验你的防线。每次得手都降低你的胜算。

trans-unit.source: Seafloor Oracle
trans-unit.target: 海床先知

trans-unit.resname: J22·343 | Seafloor Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的人鱼对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.
trans-unit.target: 沉船散发蓝色幽光之处，所藏秘密永无人知晓。

trans-unit.resname: J22·344 | Sentinels of Glen Elendra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sentinels of Glen Elendra
trans-unit.target: 艾蓝卓幽谷哨兵

trans-unit.resname: J22·344 | Sentinels of Glen Elendra | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行

trans-unit.resname: J22·344 | Sentinels of Glen Elendra | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some say the valley of Glen Elendra is mythical, and that rumors of its existence are nothing but a faerie prank. Others say it is the fae's most fiercely guarded secret.
trans-unit.target: 有人认为艾蓝卓幽谷只是迷思，其传说仅为仙灵的恶戏。其他人则认为这是仙儿守护最严的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Serum Visions
trans-unit.target: 浆液预视

trans-unit.resname: J22·345 | Serum Visions | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.
trans-unit.target: 原本采自秘罗地光蛾的浆液，可让饮者眼中见得启悟。如今浆液萃自非瑞克西亚墨蛾，能令受者眼中得见完美。

trans-unit.source: Shaper Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 塑形师学徒

trans-unit.resname: J22·346 | Shaper Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控另一个人鱼，CARDNAME便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.
trans-unit.target: 纵使沉船千艘，川流使也要阻止入侵者找到黄金城。

trans-unit.source: Shimmer Dragon
trans-unit.target: 闪光巨龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·347 | Shimmer Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs long as you control four or more artifacts, CARDNAME has hexproof.\nTap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要你操控四个或更多神器，CARDNAME便具有辟邪异能。 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.
trans-unit.target: 靛青巨龙高兴地用其一小部分珍藏换来了永恒月光。

trans-unit.source: Skilled Animator
trans-unit.target: 卓越赋生师

trans-unit.resname: J22·348 | Skilled Animator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as CARDNAME remains on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，于CARDNAME仍在战场上的时段内，目标由你操控的神器成为基础力量与防御力为5/5的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: So Tiny
trans-unit.target: 小巧精致

trans-unit.resname: J22·349 | So Tiny | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-0. It gets -6/-0 instead as long as its controller has seven or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-2/-0。只要该生物的操控者坟墓场中有七张或更多牌，便改为它得-6/-0。

trans-unit.source: His sword sounded like a silver chime on the glass jar, and the sprite laughed with delight.
trans-unit.target: 被关在玻璃瓶中的他不断用长剑敲击瓶壁，发出银铃般清脆声响。见到此景，仙子脸上露出得意笑容。

trans-unit.source: Startling Development
trans-unit.target: 惊人成长

trans-unit.resname: J22·350 | Startling Development | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 4/4.\nCycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物成为基础力量与防御力为4/4的蓝色巨蛇。 循环{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.source: Remarkably, dinner continued with no further interruptions.
trans-unit.target: 值得一提的是，此后晚餐便再无波折，平安结束。

trans-unit.source: Steelgaze Griffin
trans-unit.target: 钢目狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: J22·351 | Steelgaze Griffin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you draw your second card each turn, CARDNAME gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，CARDNAME得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "If we didn't guard our secrets, they wouldn't remain secrets for long."\n—Gadwick, the Wizened
trans-unit.target: 「如果我们不去守护秘密，那么秘密本身很快就不再神秘。」 ～老年法师盖威克

trans-unit.source: Stinging Lionfish
trans-unit.target: 螯刺狮鱼

trans-unit.resname: J22·352 | Stinging Lionfish | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，你可以横置或重置目标非地永久物。

trans-unit.source: Starfish are its favorite prey.
trans-unit.target: 海星是其最爱的猎物。

trans-unit.source: Stolen by the Fae
trans-unit.target: 仙儿窃走

trans-unit.resname: J22·353 | Stolen by the Fae | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature with mana value X to its owner's hand. You create X 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值为X的生物移回其拥有者手上。你派出X个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·353 | Stolen by the Fae | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.
trans-unit.target: 幻野居民也不总是想靠武力赶走入侵者。有时他们就只是把对方弄走。

trans-unit.source: Stonybrook Angler
trans-unit.target: 石溪钓客

trans-unit.resname: J22·354 | Stonybrook Angler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：你可以横置或重置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "Water is in the air, the trees, and the earth. Understand its motion, speak its language, and the subtle currents that flow through all living things will fall under your command."
trans-unit.target: 「天上，树里，土底都有水。了解其动向，通晓其语言，以及内部流窜的暗流，你就能掌握一切活物。」

trans-unit.source: Storm Sculptor
trans-unit.target: 风暴塑师

trans-unit.resname: J22·355 | Storm Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.
trans-unit.target: 在他的手中，风既能成为武器，也能成为脱逃的手段。

trans-unit.resname: J22·356 | Svyelun of Sea and Sky | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Svyelun of Sea and Sky

trans-unit.resname: J22·356 | Svyelun of Sea and Sky | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has indestructible as long as you control at least two other Merfolk.\nWhenever Svyelun attacks, draw a card.\nOther Merfolk you control have ward {1}. (Whenever another Merfolk you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控至少两个其他人鱼，CARDNAME便具有不灭异能。 每当希亚尔攻击时，抓一张牌。 由你操控的其他人鱼具有守护{1}。（每当另一个由你操控的人鱼成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·357 | Syr Elenora, the Discerning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syr Elenora, the Discerning
trans-unit.target: 慧眼伊诺拉爵士

trans-unit.resname: J22·357 | Syr Elenora, the Discerning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhen Syr Elenora enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nSpells your opponents cast that target Syr Elenora cost {2} more to cast.

trans-unit.resname: J22·358 | Tamiyo, the Moon Sage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tamiyo, the Moon Sage
trans-unit.target: 月智者多美代

trans-unit.resname: J22·358 | Tamiyo, the Moon Sage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\n−2: Draw a card for each tapped creature target player controls.\n−8: You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size" and "Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to your hand."
trans-unit.target: +1：横置目标永久物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 −2：目标牌手每操控一个已横置的生物，你便抓一张牌。 −8：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你的手牌数量没有上限」与「每当一张牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，你可以将它移回你手上。」

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Protege

trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Teferi's legacy lives on in Tolaria through the study of time magic and a tradition of irrepressible mischief.
trans-unit.target: 对于时间魔法的持续研习和学生间难以克制的作弄传统，让泰菲力的精神得以在陶拉里亚流传。

trans-unit.resname: J22·360 | Tezzeret, Artifice Master | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tezzeret, Artifice Master
trans-unit.target: 神器大师泰兹瑞
