trans-unit.source: +1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.\n0: Draw a card. If you control three or more artifacts, draw two cards instead.\n−9: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."
trans-unit.target: +1：派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 0：抓一张牌。如果你操控三个或更多神器，则改为抓两张牌。 −9：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「在你的结束步骤开始时，从你牌库中搜寻一张永久物牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·361 | Thopter Spy Network | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thopter Spy Network
trans-unit.target: 振翼机情报网

trans-unit.resname: J22·361 | Thopter Spy Network | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.\nWhenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控神器，则派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 每当由你操控的一个或数个神器生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Kraken
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚巨海兽

trans-unit.resname: J22·362 | Tolarian Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，你可以支付{1}。当你如此作时，你可以横置或重置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "It's contemplative, resourceful, and original. Everything else aside, it's the perfect student."\n—Naban, dean of iteration
trans-unit.target: 「它沉着冷静，思维敏捷，做法独到。不考虑其他因素的话，最好的学生就该像它这样。」 ～迭演院长奈班

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚哨兵

trans-unit.resname: J22·363 | Tolarian Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {U}，{T}，弃一张牌：将目标由你操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "It is not just our people I try to rescue. It is our culture, and our hope that we can return to greatness."
trans-unit.target: 「我救助的对象不只是同胞而已。还包括了我们的文化，以及我们再次繁荣的希望。」

trans-unit.source: Tome Anima
trans-unit.target: 魔典活灵

trans-unit.resname: J22·364 | Tome Anima | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
trans-unit.target: 只要你本回合中已抓两张或更多牌，CARDNAME便不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes knowledge takes on a life of its own.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，知识会自己演绎出生命。

trans-unit.source: Triton Shorestalker
trans-unit.target: 岸袭屈东

trans-unit.resname: J22·365 | Triton Shorestalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Who will miss you, drywalker? A wife? A child? Perhaps they will blame the sea for your fate, and teach future generations to stay far away from it."
trans-unit.target: 「地上人，谁会思念你？妻子？孩子？或许他们会将你的命运归咎于大海，教导后世子孙远离它。」

trans-unit.source: Undersea Invader
trans-unit.target: 海底入侵客

trans-unit.resname: J22·366 | Undersea Invader | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: "The currents are strange today, and the fish are fearful. Something's stirring in the depths."\n—Rathstaf, Kannah fisherman
trans-unit.target: 「今日洋流有异，鱼群惊慌失措。海底可能有什么动静。」 ～卡纳渔夫拉斯塔弗

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Engineer
trans-unit.target: 维多肯工程师

trans-unit.resname: J22·367 | Vedalken Engineer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。

trans-unit.source: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯族不懂艺术～对他们来说，万物均各有创造目的。

trans-unit.source: Vendilion Clique
trans-unit.target: 薇安留聚群

trans-unit.resname: J22·368 | Vendilion Clique | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标牌手的手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。若你如此作，则该牌手展示所选的牌，将它置于其牌库底，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Wake Thrasher
trans-unit.target: 波涛痛击兵

trans-unit.resname: J22·369 | Wake Thrasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent you control becomes untapped, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的永久物成为未横置时，CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Anyone who thinks merrows have more brains than brawn has never been run over by one.
trans-unit.target: 以为美洛只懂机巧而没肌肉的人，一定是没给他们踩在脚底过。

trans-unit.source: Watertrap Weaver
trans-unit.target: 水阱织师

trans-unit.resname: J22·370 | Watertrap Weaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: The river is a powerful friend.
trans-unit.target: 河流是强大的伙伴。

trans-unit.source: Wavebreak Hippocamp
trans-unit.target: 裂波鱼驹

trans-unit.resname: J22·371 | Wavebreak Hippocamp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Tritons search for omens in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 屈东随其行迹寻找预兆。

trans-unit.source: Weldfast Wingsmith
trans-unit.target: 焊锢区翼匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·372 | Weldfast Wingsmith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Airships are too confining. If I'm in the sky, I want to feel the wind in my hair and taste the aether."
trans-unit.target: 「飞船太拘束了。如果我在空中飞翔，我就要感受风吹发梢，体会乙太拂身。」

trans-unit.source: Windrider Patrol
trans-unit.target: 御风巡卫

trans-unit.resname: J22·373 | Windrider Patrol | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: Winter's Rest
trans-unit.target: 冬蛰

trans-unit.resname: J22·374 | Winter's Rest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.\nAs long as you control another snow permanent, enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物。 只要你操控另一个雪境永久物，所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中便不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Alley Strangler
trans-unit.target: 暗巷绞杀客

trans-unit.resname: J22·375 | Alley Strangler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: "You never know what day might be your last."
trans-unit.target: 「你不会知道哪天就是你的死期。」

trans-unit.source: Ancient Craving
trans-unit.target: 远古渴望

trans-unit.resname: J22·376 | Ancient Craving | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你抓三张牌且失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Knowledge demands sacrifice.
trans-unit.target: 要牺牲才能获取知识。

trans-unit.source: Black Cat
trans-unit.target: 黑猫

trans-unit.resname: J22·377 | Black Cat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, target opponent discards a card at random.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，目标对手随机弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.
trans-unit.target: 它最后的生命都要用来折磨你的梦。

trans-unit.source: Blight Keeper
trans-unit.target: 萎荒守卫

trans-unit.resname: J22·378 | Blight Keeper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {7}{B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标对手失去4点生命且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: It withers fruit and flesh alike.
trans-unit.target: 它能让花果凋零，也能让肉身凋落。

trans-unit.source: Blood Price
trans-unit.target: 鲜血代价

trans-unit.resname: J22·379 | Blood Price | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Blood is the oldest currency.
trans-unit.target: 鲜血是最古老的货币。

trans-unit.source: Bloodbond Vampire
trans-unit.target: 生脉吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: J22·380 | Bloodbond Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Let the vampires join us. In this war, we no longer have the luxury of choosing our comrades."\n—General Tazri, allied commander
trans-unit.target: 「让吸血鬼加入我们吧。在这场战争中，我们已经没有挑选战友的余地了。」 ～盟军指挥官塔兹莉将军

trans-unit.source: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
trans-unit.target: 嗜血舞空客

trans-unit.resname: J22·381 | Bloodthirsty Aerialist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你获得生命时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.
trans-unit.target: 她生时是马戏团的杂技演员，因而练就了一身流畅华美的杀人技艺，就连遭她毒手的人也对其表演赞叹不已。

trans-unit.source: Bloodtracker
trans-unit.target: 溯血师

trans-unit.source: Flying\n{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {B}，支付2点生命：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，其上每有一个+1/+1指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."
trans-unit.target: 「要逃跑就请便。你跑得越远，我就越能确切地感受到你的心跳。」

trans-unit.source: Bone Picker
trans-unit.target: 食骨鸟

trans-unit.resname: J22·383 | Bone Picker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.\nFlying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中有生物死去，则此咒语减少{3}来施放。 飞行，死触

trans-unit.source: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.
trans-unit.target: 它们是逆徒在流放路途中的首批访客。

trans-unit.source: Burglar Rat
trans-unit.target: 窃物鼠

trans-unit.resname: J22·384 | Burglar Rat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"\n—Izoni
trans-unit.target: 「连老鼠都会囤积财宝。你的珍贵宝贝又有什么特别呢？」 ～依佐妮

trans-unit.source: Cemetery Recruitment
trans-unit.target: 墓地征召

trans-unit.resname: J22·385 | Cemetery Recruitment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。如果它是灵俑牌，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."
trans-unit.target: 「我的魔法在这时空特别能挥洒自如。」

trans-unit.source: Certain Death
trans-unit.target: 必死无疑

trans-unit.resname: J22·386 | Certain Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.
trans-unit.target: 有些鬼魂会紧缠一人，以其日渐增长的恐惧为食，直到吞噬一切的终极恐怖来临。

trans-unit.source: Chittering Rats
trans-unit.target: 吱叫老鼠

trans-unit.resname: J22·387 | Chittering Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手将一张牌从其手上置于其牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Bottom feeders sometimes rise to the top.
trans-unit.target: 坏笋也有冒出头的时候。

trans-unit.resname: J22·388 | Consign to the Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consign to the Pit
trans-unit.target: 坠入深渊

trans-unit.resname: J22·388 | Consign to the Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: J22·388 | Consign to the Pit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.
trans-unit.target: 一开始，你的眼前会浮现此生往事。随后，你有足够的时间在下坠过程中反思每一丝悔恨。

trans-unit.source: Corpse Churn
trans-unit.target: 尸体翻搅

trans-unit.resname: J22·389 | Corpse Churn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 磨三张牌，然后你可以将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: "The distraction of your life has ended. Now your service begins."\n—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog
trans-unit.target: 「你生命已逝，便再无需分神。从现在开始好好为我卖命。」 ～钨拉莫鬼卒卡力塔

trans-unit.resname: J22·390 | Crow of Dark Tidings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crow of Dark Tidings
trans-unit.target: 暗潮乌鸦

trans-unit.resname: J22·390 | Crow of Dark Tidings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场或死去时，磨两张牌。（将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·390 | Crow of Dark Tidings | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, this can't be a good sign."\n—Old Rutstein
trans-unit.target: 「嗯，这可不是个好兆头。」 ～老鲁斯登

trans-unit.source: Cruel Sadist
trans-unit.target: 残酷凌虐狂

trans-unit.resname: J22·391 | Cruel Sadist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from CARDNAME: It deals X damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，支付1点生命：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {2}{B}，{T}，从CARDNAME上移去X个+1/+1指示物：它对目标生物造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Face of innocence. Hand of death. Designed by Edmund McMillen
trans-unit.target: 天真无邪的脸。挥舞死亡的手。

trans-unit.source: Crypt Rats
trans-unit.target: 墓穴老鼠

trans-unit.resname: J22·392 | Crypt Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.
trans-unit.target: {X}：CARDNAME对每个生物和每位牌手各造成X点伤害。只能将黑色法术力用于X。

trans-unit.source: "Shoo, you little worm tails—go away! My corpses aren't your dinner!"\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「去，你们这些死耗子～一边去！我的那些尸体可不是你们的晚餐！」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: Dead Weight
trans-unit.target: 重负

trans-unit.resname: J22·393 | Dead Weight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-2.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得-2/-2。

trans-unit.source: All things considered, his first day on patrol could have gone better.
trans-unit.target: 从各方面的情况来看，他的第一天巡逻本可以更顺利些。

trans-unit.source: Death Wind
trans-unit.target: 死亡之风

trans-unit.resname: J22·394 | Death Wind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I am a dragonslayer for Lord Silumgar. There is no dragon save him whom I fear."\n—Xathi the Infallible
trans-unit.target: 「吾乃席穆嘉龙王麾下的屠龙客。众生之龙独其唯尊，余者皆不惧。」 ～从不失手的珊西

trans-unit.source: Deathbloom Thallid
trans-unit.target: 死华散绿菌

trans-unit.resname: J22·395 | Deathbloom Thallid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."\n—Marwyn of Llanowar
trans-unit.target: 「大自然并不总是温和仁慈，但万物生生不息。」 ～罗堰的玛雯

trans-unit.source: Deathbringer Regent
trans-unit.target: 夺命龙侯

trans-unit.resname: J22·396 | Deathbringer Regent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之且战场上有五个或更多其他生物，则消灭所有其他生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·397 | Demon of Catastrophes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demon of Catastrophes
trans-unit.target: 灾变恶魔

trans-unit.resname: J22·397 | Demon of Catastrophes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nFlying, trample
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: J22·397 | Demon of Catastrophes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A pit yawned open, a column of oily smoke arose, and a towering form hissed, "I accept this offering."
trans-unit.target: 暗渊打开，污烟升起，只闻一道巨影低语：「我收下这份祭礼。」

trans-unit.source: Demonic Gifts
trans-unit.target: 恶魔赠礼

trans-unit.resname: J22·398 | Demonic Gifts | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+0且获得「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。」

trans-unit.source: It began as a flavor on the tongue, like a bloody morsel of roast boar—but soon the power was a conflagration in her veins.
trans-unit.target: 开始先是口中涌现血腥滋味，像是吃下一块渗血未熟透的烤野猪肉～但这股力量很快就烧遍周身经脉。

trans-unit.source: Demon's Disciple
trans-unit.target: 恶魔信徒

trans-unit.resname: J22·399 | Demon's Disciple | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: Taborax's cultists are the latest in a long history of beings who have desired to see Zendikar torn to pieces.
trans-unit.target: 悠悠历史长河中，曾有无数势力希望眼见赞迪卡彻底毁灭；塔博锐教众是其中最新一支。

trans-unit.source: Demon's Grasp
trans-unit.target: 恶魔之攫

trans-unit.resname: J22·400 | Demon's Grasp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「你应该感到欣慰，因为你活不到见证赞迪卡灭亡的那天了。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.source: Devouring Swarm
trans-unit.target: 吞噬虫群

trans-unit.resname: J22·401 | Devouring Swarm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nSacrifice a creature: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Their arrival is heralded by the deafening hum of ten thousand wings. Their departure is marked by the silence of the dead.
trans-unit.target: 它们来时伴着千万翅翼的轰音。它们去时留下亡者的寂静。

trans-unit.source: Doomed Dissenter
trans-unit.target: 注亡逆徒

trans-unit.resname: J22·402 | Doomed Dissenter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.
trans-unit.target: 被逐出法老神城市的人，面前只有一种命运。

trans-unit.source: Dread Presence
trans-unit.target: 颤栗鬼影

trans-unit.resname: J22·403 | Dread Presence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —\n• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.\n• CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个沼泽在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～ •你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。 •CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: It beckons silently, waiting in the darkness.
trans-unit.target: 它在黑暗之中静静等待，悄然回应。

trans-unit.source: Dread Rider
trans-unit.target: 恐惧魂骑

trans-unit.resname: J22·404 | Dread Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：目标对手失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "What kind of monstrous grave robber leaves the treasures, but takes the bodies?"\n—Fjall, Beskir elder
trans-unit.target: 「哪门子的盗墓贼会把珍宝留下，而把尸体带走？」 ～贝斯奇长老弗亚尔

trans-unit.source: Dread Slaver
trans-unit.target: 可怖奴隶主

trans-unit.resname: J22·405 | Dread Slaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
trans-unit.target: 每当本回合中受过CARDNAME伤害的生物死去时，将它在你的操控下移回战场。该生物是黑色灵俑，且仍具有原本颜色与类别。

trans-unit.source: Half a brain rules the mindless.
trans-unit.target: 统治无知者仅需半边脑。

trans-unit.source: Dreadhound
trans-unit.target: 恐惧猎犬

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)\nWhenever a creature dies or a creature card is put into a graveyard from a library, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。（将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。） 每当一个生物死去或一张生物牌从牌库进入坟墓场时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: It herds souls toward eternal torment.
trans-unit.target: 它把灵魂赶向无限苦难。

trans-unit.source: Dune Beetle
trans-unit.target: 沙丘甲虫

trans-unit.source: The scouring sands of Shefet polish its carapace, and the ranks of the cursed fill its belly.
trans-unit.target: 谢菲的猛烈风沙磨亮其甲壳，大群受诅者则填饱其肚子。

trans-unit.source: Durable Coilbug
trans-unit.target: 硬壳蜷曲虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·408 | Durable Coilbug | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {4}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "I've seen them survive lava, trampling, and a moloch's digestive system. They just roll out and get on with their lives!"\n—Gannet, Skysail zoologist
trans-unit.target: 「我曾见过它们活过熔岩、踩踏，甚至是棘蜥的肠胃。它们就这么滚出来，安然无恙地活下去！」 ～翔空城动物学家加涅特

trans-unit.source: Eaten Alive
trans-unit.target: 生吞活剥

trans-unit.resname: J22·409 | Eaten Alive | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.\nExile target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物或支付{3}{B}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.source: "If you hear a groaning noise in the cellar, don't investigate. Don't split up. Just lock the door and barricade it."\n—Emili, guard captain
trans-unit.target: 「如果你听见地窖传出呻吟声，不要好奇妄动。不要分头行事。只管闩紧门口，全力顶住。」 ～守卫队长艾蜜莉

trans-unit.resname: J22·410 | Endless Ranks of the Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Endless Ranks of the Dead
trans-unit.target: 无尽亡者行列

trans-unit.resname: J22·410 | Endless Ranks of the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为由你操控之灵俑数量的一半，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: J22·410 | Endless Ranks of the Dead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.
trans-unit.target: 瑟班军队被召回城墙附近，边陲的村庄只好自筹防务。

trans-unit.resname: J22·411 | Epicure of Blood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Epicure of Blood
trans-unit.target: 鲜血饕客

trans-unit.resname: J22·411 | Epicure of Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·411 | Epicure of Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."
trans-unit.target: 「肉香浓郁，稍带一丝皮味。实属佳酿。」

trans-unit.source: Eviscerate
trans-unit.target: 摘胆剜心

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "Fear the dark if you must, but don't mistake sunlight for safety."\n—Josu Vess
trans-unit.target: 「你可以畏惧黑暗，这并不代表光天化日之下必定安全。」 ～霍苏维斯

trans-unit.source: Exsanguinate
trans-unit.target: 放干鲜血

trans-unit.source: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各失去X点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.
trans-unit.target: 对吸血鬼来说，耐心不是美德，贪食亦非罪恶。

trans-unit.source: Falkenrath Noble
trans-unit.target: 伐肯纳贵族

trans-unit.resname: J22·414 | Falkenrath Noble | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或另一个生物死去时，目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."
trans-unit.target: 「我经常在想，被选为我的猎物者会感到多么刺激。」

trans-unit.source: Fetid Imp
trans-unit.target: 腥臭小恶魔

trans-unit.resname: J22·415 | Fetid Imp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{B}: CARDNAME gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {B}：CARDNAME获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Many deaths are distasteful, but only a few are truly repugnant.
trans-unit.target: 死亡大多令人恶心，但有些实在令人作呕。

trans-unit.source: Fungal Infection
trans-unit.target: 真菌感染

trans-unit.resname: J22·416 | Fungal Infection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: To thallids, the whole world is just a pile of mulch to grow saprolings in.
trans-unit.target: 对散绿菌而言，整个世界都是能培育腐生物的护根壤。

trans-unit.source: Gavony Unhallowed
trans-unit.target: 加渥尼孽物

trans-unit.resname: J22·417 | Gavony Unhallowed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."\n—Grete, Order of Saint Traft
trans-unit.target: 「我们来到教堂寻求慰藉，但我们逐渐明白，这已经不可能了。」 ～圣沙弗骑士团的葛俐

trans-unit.source: Ghoulraiser
trans-unit.target: 呼伴食尸鬼

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，随机将一张灵俑牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh."\n—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 「来。带着你的兄弟。今晚，你可以尝活人的肉。」 ～涅非利亚尸鬼牧者贾达

trans-unit.source: Gnawing Zombie
trans-unit.target: 啃食灵俑

trans-unit.resname: J22·419 | Gnawing Zombie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.
trans-unit.target: 在寂静的夜晚，你能听到它腐烂的牙齿不知疲倦地磨着捡来的骨头。

trans-unit.source: Gorging Vulture
trans-unit.target: 食尸兀鹰

trans-unit.resname: J22·420 | Gorging Vulture | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨四张牌。每以此法磨掉一张生物牌，你便获得1点生命。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Graf Harvest
trans-unit.target: 战墓收成

trans-unit.resname: J22·421 | Graf Harvest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Zombies you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\n{3}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的灵俑具有威慑异能。（它们只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） {3}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌：派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Graveblade Marauder
trans-unit.target: 墓刃劫掠者

trans-unit.resname: J22·422 | Graveblade Marauder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手失去等同于你坟墓场中生物牌数量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Gravecrawler
trans-unit.target: 墓场匍尸

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.\nYou may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。 只要你操控灵俑，你便可以从你的坟墓场中施放CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Innistrad's ghoulcallers are talented enough, but let me show you what someone with real power can create."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「依尼翠的尸鬼牧者算是有点天分，但我要你瞧瞧拥有真正力量者能造出什么来。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Gravedigger
trans-unit.target: 掘墓怪

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
trans-unit.target: 满载的棺木就像满载的宝库～两者都对贼有吸引力。

trans-unit.source: Grotesque Mutation
trans-unit.target: 怪诞变异

trans-unit.resname: J22·425 | Grotesque Mutation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+3/+1且获得系命异能。

trans-unit.source: Hooded Assassin
trans-unit.target: 覆篷杀手

trans-unit.resname: J22·426 | Hooded Assassin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —\n• Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n• Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 •消灭目标本回合中受过伤害的生物。

trans-unit.source: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
trans-unit.target: 不当遗产

trans-unit.resname: J22·427 | Ill-Gotten Inheritance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.\n{5}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。 {5}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：它向目标对手造成4点伤害且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The suffering of others is not my concern."
trans-unit.target: 「别人是否受罪与我无关。」

trans-unit.source: Inner Demon
trans-unit.target: 潜伏魔性

trans-unit.resname: J22·428 | Inner Demon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2，具有飞行异能，且额外具有恶魔此类别。 当CARDNAME进战场时，所有非恶魔生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Kalastria Nightwatch
trans-unit.target: 卡列奇夜巡卫

trans-unit.resname: J22·429 | Kalastria Nightwatch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
trans-unit.target: 「卡力塔或已成为奥札奇手下毫无思想的奴隶，但我们不会让这类事情再次发生。」 ～卡列奇血侯哲娜

trans-unit.source: Karfell Kennel-Master
trans-unit.target: 卡尔费育兽师

trans-unit.resname: J22·430 | Karfell Kennel-Master | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，至多两个目标生物各得+1/+0且获得不灭异能。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它们消灭。）

trans-unit.source: Trapped in a realm of dead flesh and scarce hunting, the ravenous wolves of Karfell follow the Dread Marn to warm game.
trans-unit.target: 卡尔费此境域满是不死生物，几乎无从狩猎；被困于此的贪食狼群只得跟随玛恩惧怖军来活动筋骨。

trans-unit.resname: J22·431 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
trans-unit.target: 贮魂恶魔柯索非

trans-unit.resname: J22·431 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当一个由其他牌手拥有的永久物从战场进入坟墓场时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·431 | Kothophed, Soul Hoarder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."
trans-unit.target: 「我会是你最苛刻的主人，莉莲娜。但我对你有很高的期望。」

trans-unit.source: Kraul Swarm
trans-unit.target: 刻洛虫群

trans-unit.resname: J22·432 | Kraul Swarm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {2}{B}，弃一张生物牌：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member ever died, and to whom it owes the grudge.
trans-unit.target: 母巢的记性极佳。它清楚每一位成员的死因，以及要寻仇的对象。

trans-unit.resname: J22·433 | Liliana, Death's Majesty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Death's Majesty
trans-unit.target: 亡者女王莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: J22·433 | Liliana, Death's Majesty | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.\n−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.\n−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.
trans-unit.target: +1：派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。磨两张牌。 −3：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。该生物是黑色灵俑，且仍具有原本颜色与类别。 −7：消灭所有非灵俑生物。

trans-unit.source: Liliana's Elite
trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜的精兵

trans-unit.resname: J22·434 | Liliana's Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: "You have to admit, Gideon—he has great form."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「你就承认吧，基定～这家伙很能打。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Liliana's Mastery
trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜的掌控

trans-unit.resname: J22·435 | Liliana's Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Zombies you control get +1/+1.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的灵俑得+1/+1。 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."
trans-unit.target: 「数量可真多。它们好像正等着服侍人。」

trans-unit.source: Liliana's Steward
trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜的管家

trans-unit.resname: J22·436 | Liliana's Steward | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标对手弃一张牌。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: Servants at Vess Manor are chosen for their strong work ethic and respectful demeanor. Being alive is not required.
trans-unit.target: 维斯宅邸挑选仆从，看重的是敬业态度与得体举止。至于是死是活并不重要。

trans-unit.source: Lurking Deadeye
trans-unit.target: 伏击神射手

trans-unit.resname: J22·437 | Lurking Deadeye | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标本回合中受过伤害的生物。

trans-unit.source: "There's no roar so mighty that it can't be silenced."
trans-unit.target: 「无论咆哮有多宏伟，都能令其噤声。」

trans-unit.source: Maalfeld Twins
trans-unit.target: 玛费尔双身

trans-unit.resname: J22·438 | Maalfeld Twins | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出两个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Who am I to break up a family?"\n—Gisa the Mad
trans-unit.target: 「我凭什么去拆散一个家庭？」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: Marauding Blight-Priest
trans-unit.target: 劫掠芜土僧

trans-unit.resname: J22·439 | Marauding Blight-Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The vampires never had gods. We followed our bloodchiefs. Now they are gone. What is left? Destruction and death, my friends. That is enough."
trans-unit.target: 「吸血鬼一族从未信奉过神明。我们唯血侯为尊。如今他们也一去不返。你要说还剩下什么？朋友，只要毁灭和死亡还在，这就足够了。」

trans-unit.source: Marauding Boneslasher
trans-unit.target: 劫掠碎骨怪

trans-unit.resname: J22·440 | Marauding Boneslasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block unless you control another Zombie.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控另一个灵俑，否则CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.
trans-unit.target: 避世帘被毁后，曾妄图进入拿塔蒙的漂浪亡者终可肆虐全城。

trans-unit.source: Massacre Wurm
trans-unit.target: 屠戮亚龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·441 | Massacre Wurm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.\nWhenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，该牌手失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Mire Blight
trans-unit.target: 泥沼萎疾

trans-unit.resname: J22·442 | Mire Blight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当所结附的生物受到伤害时，将它消灭。

trans-unit.source: "Is there anything in Guul Draz that *doesn't* suck the life out of you?"\n—Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword
trans-unit.target: 「古坠兹里面除了会把你生命吸干的东西，还会有*别的*吗？」 ～海户贷剑客塔莎

trans-unit.source: Mire Triton
trans-unit.target: 泥沼屈东

trans-unit.resname: J22·443 | Mire Triton | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨两张牌且你获得2点生命。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.
trans-unit.target: 徘徊在生与死、地与海、忆与忘之间。

trans-unit.resname: J22·444 | Moment of Craving | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moment of Craving
trans-unit.target: 渴血之时

trans-unit.resname: J22·444 | Moment of Craving | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标生物。该生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·444 | Moment of Craving | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"
trans-unit.target: 「惩戒之时就在眼前。暮影盖世，赐汝永眠！」

trans-unit.source: Moodmark Painter
trans-unit.target: 貌纹绘师

trans-unit.resname: J22·445 | Moodmark Painter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undergrowth — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 朽力～当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，目标生物获得威慑异能且得+X/+0，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Necromancer's Stockpile
trans-unit.target: 死灵术士备品室

trans-unit.resname: J22·446 | Necromancer's Stockpile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card. If the discarded card was a Zombie card, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，弃一张生物牌：抓一张牌。如果所弃之牌是灵俑牌，则派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The experiments decided to perform some research of their own.
trans-unit.target: 实验体决定自己开始研究。

trans-unit.source: Necrotic Wound
trans-unit.target: 溃疽伤

trans-unit.resname: J22·447 | Necrotic Wound | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 朽力～目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: The assassins of the Ochran distill toxins from the remains of their previous victims.
trans-unit.target: 瓯坎的杀手会从他们之前的杀害对象身上提炼毒素。

trans-unit.source: Nested Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 巢居食尸鬼

trans-unit.resname: J22·448 | Nested Ghoul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, create a 2/2 black Phyrexian Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，派出一个2/2黑色非瑞人／灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "The chest cavity is cleared of useless meat. I know just what to do with the space."\n—Gyed, Vault Priest
trans-unit.target: 「胸腔的赘肉已经清空。我知道该如何安排这空间。」 ～黯窖僧侣翟得

trans-unit.source: Nirkana Assassin
trans-unit.target: 涅卡那杀手

trans-unit.resname: J22·449 | Nirkana Assassin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, CARDNAME gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，CARDNAME获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Nirkana assassins craft incurable concoctions by mixing basilisk marrow and deathwillow sap with the vital fluids of a dozen other poisonous species.
trans-unit.target: 涅卡那杀手将蜥怪骨髓与毒柳树液和其他有毒物种的体液混合，制成了无解的毒药合剂。

trans-unit.resname: J22·450 | Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
trans-unit.target: 忿恨欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: J22·450 | Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.\n−2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成1点伤害。 −2：消灭目标生物。其操控者抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·451 | Ob Nixilis's Cruelty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
trans-unit.target: 欧尼希兹的酷行

trans-unit.resname: J22·451 | Ob Nixilis's Cruelty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: J22·451 | Ob Nixilis's Cruelty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.
trans-unit.target: 受困拉尼卡后，无意加入任一方的欧尼希兹只能从恣意折磨中寻得慰藉。

trans-unit.source: Ophiomancer
trans-unit.target: 舞蛇术士

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，若你未操控蛇，则派出一个1/1黑色，具死触异能的蛇衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "There are dark, ancient arts that fascinate even me."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: 「有些黑暗而古老的艺术，甚至连我都会入迷。」 ～索霖马可夫

trans-unit.source: Oversold Cemetery
trans-unit.target: 超卖墓园

trans-unit.resname: J22·453 | Oversold Cemetery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Debaser
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚贬者

trans-unit.resname: J22·454 | Phyrexian Debaser | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."\n—Phyrexian progress notes
trans-unit.target: 「疾病的第二阶段：高烧和严重感染。」 ～非瑞克西亚进展纪录

trans-unit.source: Pit Keeper
trans-unit.target: 暗渊门卫

trans-unit.resname: J22·455 | Pit Keeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."
trans-unit.target: 「不死生物并非给『唤醒』。它们是因暗渊挤不下新尸体而被赶出来的。」

trans-unit.source: Plague Spitter
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫喷兽

trans-unit.resname: J22·456 | Plague Spitter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, it deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，CARDNAME对每个生物和每位牌手各造成1点伤害。 当CARDNAME死去时，它对每个生物和每位牌手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: J22·457 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of the Blood Rite
trans-unit.target: 血仪僧侣

trans-unit.resname: J22·457 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。 在你的维持开始时，你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: J22·457 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.
trans-unit.target: 有人愿意舍弃一切，只为品尝力量的滋味。

trans-unit.resname: J22·458 | Reaper from the Abyss | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reaper from the Abyss
trans-unit.target: 深渊刽子手

trans-unit.resname: J22·458 | Reaper from the Abyss | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nMorbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, destroy target non-Demon creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 丧心～在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则消灭目标非恶魔生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·458 | Reaper from the Abyss | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Avacyn has deserted you. I welcome your devotion in her stead."
trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣抛弃了你。我欢迎你转而为我奉献。」

trans-unit.source: Reave Soul
trans-unit.target: 裂魂术

trans-unit.resname: J22·459 | Reave Soul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量等于或小于3的生物。

trans-unit.source: "I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「在我亲眼看到之前，我无法确信你是否有灵魂。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Returned Reveler
trans-unit.target: 转世贪欢者

trans-unit.resname: J22·460 | Returned Reveler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各磨三张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: The flesh is dead and the life forgotten, but old habits persist.
trans-unit.target: 纵使肉身已逝，前世均已忘怀，旧习依然难改。

trans-unit.source: Revenant
trans-unit.target: 复仇者

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.source: "Not again."\n—Hans
trans-unit.target: 「别又来了。」 ～汉斯

trans-unit.source: Ruthless Disposal
trans-unit.target: 无情抛弃

trans-unit.resname: J22·462 | Ruthless Disposal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card and sacrifice a creature.\nTwo target creatures each get -13/-13 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌并牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 两个目标生物各得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Do try to pull your weight, Geralf. I feel like I'm doing everything."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「别想偷懒，基拉夫。怎么全都是我在动手。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: J22·463 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seizan, Perverter of Truth
trans-unit.target: 颠倒黑白的逝斩

trans-unit.resname: J22·463 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 2 life and draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手失去2点生命且抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: J22·463 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you would taste the wisdom of the oni, be prepared to salt it with your blood."\n—Kiku, Night's Flower
trans-unit.target: 「若想尝尝邪鬼的智慧，先准备用自身鲜血来调味。」 ～幽菊切苦

trans-unit.source: Shadowborn Demon
trans-unit.target: 影裔恶魔

trans-unit.resname: J22·464 | Shadowborn Demon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target non-Demon creature.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fewer than six creature cards in your graveyard, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非恶魔生物。 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中的生物牌少于六张，则牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: Shambling Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 跛行食尸鬼

trans-unit.resname: J22·465 | Shambling Ghoul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.
trans-unit.target: 一旦起身向前，便将蹒跚不止。

trans-unit.source: Sinuous Vermin
trans-unit.target: 扭曲病媒

trans-unit.resname: J22·466 | Sinuous Vermin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {3}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is monstrous, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{B}：蛮化3。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物且它已蛮化。） 只要CARDNAME已蛮化，它便具有威慑异能。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·467 | Skirsdag High Priest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skirsdag High Priest
trans-unit.target: 史革达高阶僧侣

trans-unit.resname: J22·467 | Skirsdag High Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～{T}，横置两个由你操控且未横置的生物：派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。只能于有生物死去的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: J22·467 | Skirsdag High Priest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."
trans-unit.target: 「瑟班的祈祷无人听闻。我们的可不会。」

trans-unit.source: Skirsdag Supplicant
trans-unit.target: 史革达祈愿僧

trans-unit.resname: J22·468 | Skirsdag Supplicant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，弃一张牌：每位牌手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I can no longer stand by as these Skirsdag infiltrators rot the church from within. Even the Lunarch Council is compromised. What a fool I've been."\n—Odric
trans-unit.target: 「我不能再袖手旁观，任由这些史革达潜入者从内部败坏教会。连月主会也已堕落。我居然如此无知。」 ～欧吉克

trans-unit.source: Sling-Gang Lieutenant
trans-unit.target: 掷弹指战官

trans-unit.resname: J22·469 | Sling-Gang Lieutenant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.\nSacrifice a Goblin: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。 牺牲一个鬼怪：目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Freshly promoted to "first rock," Zaz was eager to make an impact.
trans-unit.target: 刚晋升为「尖石」的查仔等不及要有冲击性的表现。

trans-unit.source: Soulcage Fiend
trans-unit.target: 魂槛邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: J22·470 | Soulcage Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.
trans-unit.target: 凯思汀发誓要让孩子的灵魂获得自由，跟踪拷问者进入史顿襄地底阴森的洞穴网。

trans-unit.source: Spark Reaper
trans-unit.target: 火花掠夺客

trans-unit.resname: J22·471 | Spark Reaper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {3}，牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客：你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."\n—Kaya
trans-unit.target: 「我知道它们都是为收割灵魂而生的不息战士～可它们的手法未免太粗鲁了。」 ～卡娅

trans-unit.source: Stitcher's Supplier
trans-unit.target: 拼接师备尸

trans-unit.resname: J22·472 | Stitcher's Supplier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或死去时，磨三张牌。（将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: No part goes to waste.
trans-unit.target: 一个部位也不浪费。

trans-unit.source: Strangling Spores
trans-unit.target: 窒息芽孢

trans-unit.resname: J22·473 | Strangling Spores | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.
trans-unit.target: 想象一下你的肺中冒出千朵蘑菇。

trans-unit.resname: J22·474 | Syr Konrad, the Grim | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Syr Konrad, the Grim
trans-unit.target: 冷酷孔纳德爵士

trans-unit.resname: J22·474 | Syr Konrad, the Grim | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.\n{1}{B}: Each player mills a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物死去，或一张生物牌从战场以外的任何区域进入坟墓场，或一张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。 {1}{B}：每位牌手各磨一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Takenuma Bleeder
trans-unit.target: 竹沼血祭师

trans-unit.resname: J22·475 | Takenuma Bleeder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life if you don't control a Demon.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击或阻挡时，若你未操控恶魔，则你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I prefer to weave my magic through oni blood, but yours will do in a pinch."
trans-unit.target: 「我通常以邪鬼的血来施展咒语，但紧急时你的也成。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·476 | Tivash, Gloom Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tivash, Gloom Summoner
trans-unit.target: 幽光召唤师提瓦什

trans-unit.resname: J22·476 | Tivash, Gloom Summoner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may pay X life, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. If you do, create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 系命 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过生命，则你可以支付X点生命，X为你本回合中获得过的生命数量。若你如此作，则派出一个X/X黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Tormented Soul
trans-unit.target: 受虐灵魂

trans-unit.resname: J22·477 | Tormented Soul | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block and can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡，也不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.
trans-unit.target: 生时愤恨这世界的人，受诅要在死后游荡阴间。

trans-unit.source: Tragic Slip
trans-unit.target: 悲剧失足

trans-unit.resname: J22·478 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nMorbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.
trans-unit.target: 若徘徊于死亡门口，小心会给请进去。

trans-unit.source: Triskaidekaphobia
trans-unit.target: 十三恐惧症

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —\n• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life.\n• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，选择一项～ •每位总生命正好为13的牌手各输掉这盘游戏，然后每位牌手各获得1点生命。 •每位总生命正好为13的牌手各输掉这盘游戏，然后每位牌手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Typhoid Rats
trans-unit.target: 伤寒鼠

trans-unit.resname: J22·480 | Typhoid Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.source: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.
trans-unit.target: 在海温古被捕的绑架犯有两条路可选：在牢里关上多年，或是去当捕鼠人。聪明的就会选择进牢。

trans-unit.source: Ulcerate
trans-unit.target: 溃烂

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。你失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「如果目的仅在于致命，这就够了。但这门技艺是要使它造成的痛苦达到最大。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Undead Augur
trans-unit.target: 不死卜算师

trans-unit.resname: J22·482 | Undead Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的灵俑死去时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "To see past the veil of death, cross it."\n—*The Red Book of Mezdrithalik*
trans-unit.target: 「若想看透死亡的面纱，只需一穿而过。」 ～*《梅崔札力的红皮书》*

trans-unit.source: Vampire Envoy
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼特使

trans-unit.resname: J22·483 | Vampire Envoy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Zendikar will fight until it has bled its last."
trans-unit.target: 「赞迪卡会战斗不息，直到流尽最后一滴血。」

trans-unit.source: Vampiric Rites
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼仪式

trans-unit.resname: J22·484 | Vampiric Rites | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: For vampires, blood carries more than life. Memories long eroded from the minds of bloodchiefs can be reclaimed from the veins of their sired kin.
trans-unit.target: 对于吸血鬼而言，血液承载的远不止生命本身。血侯逝去的记忆可以从其子嗣的血脉中重现。

trans-unit.source: Vermin Gorger
trans-unit.target: 病媒饕客

trans-unit.resname: J22·485 | Vermin Gorger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Once, vampires ruled this world, commanding the fear and respect that befit our noble blood. Have we truly sunk so low?"\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: 「吸血鬼曾统治这世界，博得与我们高贵血统相称的恐惧和尊敬。难道我们已彻底堕落至此？」 ～索霖马可夫

trans-unit.source: Village Rites
trans-unit.target: 村民仪式

trans-unit.resname: J22·486 | Village Rites | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages—cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.
trans-unit.target: 斯凯尔人每征服一处村庄，都会在当地立起兽头棒～这种利用木棒与骨头制成的诅咒图腾像能够削弱幸存者的力气和反抗意志。

trans-unit.resname: J22·487 | Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose
trans-unit.target: 暮影蔷薇之棘维托

trans-unit.resname: J22·487 | Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.\n{3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，目标对手失去等量的生命。 {3}{B}{B}：由你操控的生物获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·487 | Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Through the blood of the wicked, we shall be redeemed. Let us pray."
trans-unit.target: 「经由奉献恶者之血，我们必将得到救赎。祈祷吧。」

trans-unit.source: Wailing Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 悲号食尸鬼

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「别担心，亲爱的弟弟。帮手马上就来了。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以使它对另一个由你操控的生物造成2点伤害。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."
trans-unit.target: 「有些人生来就是伟人。而你生来就是给伟人擦地板的。」

trans-unit.source: Witch's Cauldron
trans-unit.target: 巫婆鼎镬

trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The best recipes start with reliable cookware.
trans-unit.target: 美味食谱始于可靠炉具。

trans-unit.resname: J22·491 | Yargle, Glutton of Urborg | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yargle, Glutton of Urborg
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格吞蛙雅骨尔

trans-unit.resname: J22·491 | Yargle, Glutton of Urborg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.
trans-unit.target: 贝赞洛的副手雅库开始展露野心，恶魔领主便把他变成一条蛆虫。有只青蛙吞下了这条蛆虫后不断变大，最终贪食的精怪从其体内破膛而出。

trans-unit.resname: J22·492 | Act on Impulse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Act on Impulse
trans-unit.target: 逞性妄为

trans-unit.resname: J22·492 | Act on Impulse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的三张牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。（如果你以此法施放咒语，你依旧要支付其费用。你只能于你仍有可使用地数的时候，才能以此法使用地。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·492 | Act on Impulse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You don't want to know what happens after I put on the goggles."
trans-unit.target: 「你不会想知道我戴上防护镜之后会发生什么。」

trans-unit.target: 军火商

trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，牺牲一个鬼怪：CARDNAME对目标生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Guaranteed to leave your enemies sufficiently stabbed, bitten, cleaved, or exploded."\n—Grezkrick's Emporium motto
trans-unit.target: 「保证让你的敌人被彻底刺穿、咬破、劈开、或者爆裂而亡。」 ～格自崎的店铺标语

trans-unit.source: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。 如果X等于或大于5，则此咒语不能被反击，且其伤害不能被防止。

trans-unit.source: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.
trans-unit.target: 对萨坎沃来说，巨龙是蛮勇生命的极致具现。

trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲一个神器：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was *thrown* at them.
trans-unit.target: 妖精发明了无数策略来对付蒙纳坷的战斗机械，但他们不知该如何应付给*丢*过来的。

trans-unit.source: Battle Squadron
trans-unit.target: 战斗航空队

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪们依军事用途造出一团乱七八糟的东西。

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌并派出两个珍宝衍生物。（它们是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."
trans-unit.target: 「有钱到难以想象？我向你保证，我有*丰富*的想象力。」

trans-unit.source: Blaze

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Fire never dies alone.
trans-unit.target: 火焰永不会独自熄灭。

trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。 每当你施放非生物咒语时，重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, we have a critic."\n—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个永久物时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {1}{R}，{T}，牺牲一个生物或结界：CARDNAME对目标生物造成1点伤害。该生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: It's a small step from revel to bloodbath.
trans-unit.target: 从狂欢盛宴到血色浸染不过一步之遥。

trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，直到回合结束，CARDNAME得+1/+1且获得先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: "Build a moat. If we're lucky, it can't swim."\n—Syr Branigan, knight of Ardenvale
trans-unit.target: 「建条护城河。如果运气好的话，它游不了泳。」 ～雅登瓦骑士，巴尼根爵士

trans-unit.resname: J22·503 | Bogardan Dragonheart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice another creature: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, and haste.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲另一个生物：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为基础力量与防御力为4/4，具飞行与敏捷异能的龙。

trans-unit.source: A hunger to soar must be sated.
trans-unit.target: 一飞冲天的渴望必须得到满足。

trans-unit.target: 电闪猎犬

trans-unit.resname: J22·504 | Bolt Hound | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击时，由你操控的其他生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Its spark is worse than its bite.
trans-unit.target: 电光比利齿更为凶狠。

trans-unit.source: Borderland Marauder
trans-unit.target: 边境劫掠者

trans-unit.resname: J22·505 | Borderland Marauder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.
trans-unit.target: 虽然她确实令人畏惧，但其战斗事迹却鲜有流传，因为没人能活过她的突袭。

trans-unit.source: Brazen Freebooter
trans-unit.target: 莽霸联盟掠盗

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Finders, keepers.
trans-unit.target: 谁找到，就归谁。

trans-unit.source: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.
trans-unit.target: 在巡逻次数减少后，凯锡革的街道已成为极品猎食场。

trans-unit.source: Burn Bright

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
trans-unit.target: 「古鲁人血液中的怒火，从先人在创世之初升起第一簇盛大篝火起就开始燃烧，一直延续至今。这股怒火同样也在你的体内燃烧。」 ～古鲁祭师克许卡

trans-unit.resname: J22·509 | Captain Lannery Storm | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: J22·509 | Captain Lannery Storm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\nWhenever you sacrifice a Treasure, CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） 每当你牺牲一个珍宝时，CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出四个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.
trans-unit.target: 你雇用鬼怪不是为了要教育他们的。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Trailblazer
trans-unit.target: 领路鬼怪

trans-unit.resname: J22·547 | Goblin Trailblazer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: "Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?"\n—Daphne Vail, *Diremore* first mate
trans-unit.target: 「我们为什么要跟着鬼怪走？他真能看懂那张地图吗？」 ～*焦炬号*大副达芙妮魏尔

trans-unit.source: Goblin Warchief
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪战酋长

trans-unit.resname: J22·548 | Goblin Warchief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nGoblins you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的鬼怪咒语减少{1}来施放。 由你操控的鬼怪具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Not since the days of Pashalik Mons have the Rundvelt goblins been so united or effective.
trans-unit.target: 自帕沙力克将军芒氏的时代之后，温德汶的鬼怪首次变得如此团结有效率。

trans-unit.source: Goldhound
trans-unit.target: 金辉猎犬

trans-unit.source: First strike\nMenace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: The staccato clatter of its metal claws on pavement is unmistakable.
trans-unit.target: 它铁爪摩擦地面刮出的刺耳声响，绝对没人会听错。

trans-unit.source: Goldspan Dragon
trans-unit.target: 跨金桥巨龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·550 | Goldspan Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks or becomes the target of a spell, create a Treasure token.\nTreasures you control have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add two mana of any one color."
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击或成为咒语的目标时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。 由你操控的珍宝具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力。」

trans-unit.source: Grotag Night-Runner
trans-unit.target: 葛塔夜奔客

trans-unit.resname: J22·551 | Grotag Night-Runner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.source: Naturally inquisitive and adaptable, goblins can turn their small stature to their advantage as rogues.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪天生好奇心旺盛，又极易适应周遭环境，当起浪客来更能将自己个头矮小的优势发挥得淋漓尽致。

trans-unit.source: Hordeling Outburst
trans-unit.target: 族人爆发

trans-unit.source: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出三个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Leave no scraps, lest you attract pests."\n—Mardu threat
trans-unit.target: 「别剩饭，以免招来讨厌鬼。」 ～玛尔都警语

trans-unit.source: Hungry Flames
trans-unit.target: 贪婪烈焰

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成3点伤害，且对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.
trans-unit.target: 面对在*基岚之心号*舱内意图下手破坏的多温班恩，茜卓还以火爆回击。

trans-unit.resname: J22·554 | Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪战术家依部哈夫哈特

trans-unit.resname: J22·554 | Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.\nSacrifice two Mountains: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的鬼怪被阻挡时，将它牺牲。若你如此作，则它对每个阻挡它的生物各造成4点伤害。 牺牲两个山脉：派出两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·554 | Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Everybody but me—CHARGE!"
trans-unit.target: 「全体听令，除我之外～冲锋！」

trans-unit.resname: J22·555 | Ignite the Future | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ignite the Future
trans-unit.target: 燃亮未来

trans-unit.resname: J22·555 | Ignite the Future | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may play cards this way without paying their mana costs.\nFlashback {7}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的三张牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你以此法使用这些牌时，可以不支付其法术力费用。 返照{7}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Immersturm Raider

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The demons took no captives and claimed no spoils; they sought only to destroy.
trans-unit.target: 恶魔不留俘虏，不取财物；他们只求破坏。

trans-unit.source: Impending Doom
trans-unit.target: 悲剧临头

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3 and attacks each combat if able.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+3/+3，且每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。 当所结附的生物死去时，CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Feast, for your next meal may be your last!"
trans-unit.target: 「下顿也许就是最后一顿，现在尽情吃喝吧！」

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Anything can be a weapon if you swing it hard enough.
trans-unit.target: 只要够用力挥，什么东西都能当武器。

trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Fear of fire is a sensible instinct. If I were you, I'd be terrified."
trans-unit.target: 「恐惧火焰是可以理解的本能反应。如果我是你的话，早该吓坏了。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •消灭目标神器。 •CARDNAME获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: To some satyrs, only blasphemy is sacred.
trans-unit.target: 对部分羊蹄人而言，只有亵渎神明才是致敬。

trans-unit.source: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."
trans-unit.target: 「给予龙应有的尊重者，才配冠上我们的称号。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·562 | Kari Zev, Skyship Raider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aboard her ship, the *Dragon's Smile*, Kari follows no one's rules but her own.
trans-unit.target: 上了*龙笑号*飞船后，卡丽泽夫就只会遵守自己订下的规矩。

trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿的突击兵只带走寇骡能驮走的战利品。剩下的无论价值高低，都会化作黑烟飘向空中。

trans-unit.source: Lavabrink's boiling moat is a deterrent for most, and a relaxing bath for one.
trans-unit.target: 熔缘城滚热的护城河是许多生物难以逾越的天堑，对其他生物而言却是难得的放松场地。

trans-unit.source: Goblins were first to see the potential of hedrons in the fight against the Eldrazi, for the magical stones came ready-made with pointy bits.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪最先发现了晶石可以用于对抗奥札奇，因为这些有魔力的石头是现成的尖锐武器。

trans-unit.target: 受尸鬼牧者侵扰的鬼魂成为受无尽愤怒驱使的游魂。

trans-unit.source: "Gather round and tell me all from the courts and castles."

trans-unit.target: 只要你坟墓场中有四张或更多瞬间和／或法术牌，CARDNAME便得+3/+1。 {T}，弃一张牌：放逐你牌库顶的两张牌，然后选择其中一张。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.source: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.
trans-unit.target: 油一滴滴溅在头颅上，他也逐渐接近最终点：掷蛙比赛与烧波尬火炬。

trans-unit.source: Muxus, Goblin Grandee

Put all Goblin creature cards with mana value 5 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\nWhenever Muxus attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other Goblin you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的六张牌。将其中所有法术力值等于或小于5的鬼怪生物牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。 每当穆克斯攻击时，你每操控一个其他鬼怪，它便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion.

trans-unit.source: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

trans-unit.source: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"\n—Sarkhan Vol
trans-unit.target: 「讨厌的想法在我脑海中挥之不去。这是我自己的疯狂，还是他者的细语？」 ～萨坎沃

trans-unit.source: Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able.\nAt the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

trans-unit.source: The dwarves believe works of art should be passed down the generations, not buried with the dead.

trans-unit.source: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

trans-unit.target: 「火焰始终舞动、跳跃、旋转，不断燃点事物充盈自身。烈火永不停歇，那我为何要停？」 ～茜卓纳拉

trans-unit.source: The tenderness of a mother. The pity of a mantis.

trans-unit.source: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.
trans-unit.target: 街虫群是葛加理的劳工阶级，推动着永恒的生死循环。

trans-unit.source: Duskshell Crawler
trans-unit.target: 暮壳爬虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·650 | Duskshell Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nEach creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.
trans-unit.target: 它们经常在街灯上休息，其重量把灯柱都压垮了。

trans-unit.source: Dwynen's Elite
trans-unit.target: 德维恩的精兵

trans-unit.resname: J22·651 | Dwynen's Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控另一个妖精，则派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Call one, call them all.
trans-unit.target: 一呼百应。

trans-unit.source: Elderleaf Mentor
trans-unit.target: 古叶居导师

trans-unit.resname: J22·652 | Elderleaf Mentor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Our ancestors grew complacent in their divinity, allowing their lessers to topple them. Never again."
trans-unit.target: 「我们的祖先高居神位却骄纵自满，让逆贼得以篡位夺势。绝不容许此事再度发生。」

trans-unit.source: Elven Bow
trans-unit.target: 妖精曲弓

trans-unit.resname: J22·653 | Elven Bow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token, then attach CARDNAME to it.\nEquipped creature gets +1/+2 and has reach.\nEquip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物，然后将CARDNAME贴附于其上。 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+2且具有延势异能。 佩带{3}（{3}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.source: Elvish Warmaster
trans-unit.target: 善战妖精

trans-unit.resname: J22·654 | Elvish Warmaster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more other Elves enter the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.\n{5}{G}{G}: Elves you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个其他妖精在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。 {5}{G}{G}：直到回合结束，由你操控的妖精得+2/+2且获得死触异能。

trans-unit.source: Engulfing Slagwurm
trans-unit.target: 吞食熔滓亚龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·655 | Engulfing Slagwurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡生物或被生物阻挡时，消灭后者。你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。

trans-unit.source: Its teeth exist only for decoration.
trans-unit.target: 其牙齿只是装饰用。

trans-unit.source: Enlarge
trans-unit.target: 增大

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+7/+7且获得践踏异能。它本回合若能被阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.source: For Mittens, it was just another day at the beach.
trans-unit.target: 在小绒爪看来，只不过又是海滩上稀松平常的一天。

trans-unit.resname: J22·657 | Feed the Pack | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feed the Pack
trans-unit.target: 喂食狼群

trans-unit.resname: J22·657 | Feed the Pack | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a nontoken creature. If you do, create X 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个非衍生物的生物。若你如此作，则派出X个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的防御力。

trans-unit.source: Feral Hydra
trans-unit.target: 野性多头龙

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\n{3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Any player may activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。 {3}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。任何牌手均可以起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.
trans-unit.target: 每个头都争抢猎物最美味的部分，瞬时将之撕裂。

trans-unit.source: Ferocious Pup
trans-unit.target: 凶猛幼狼

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.
trans-unit.target: 子借群势，群壮子威。

trans-unit.source: Fertilid
trans-unit.target: 沃壤灵

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 {1}{G}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标牌手从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。
