trans-unit.target: 凶猛猎巫狼

trans-unit.resname: J22·661 | Fierce Witchstalker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: While the realm has laws, in the wilds there are other ways of balancing power.
trans-unit.target: 世境依靠法律均衡力量，幻野依靠的是其他办法。

trans-unit.source: Flourishing Hunter
trans-unit.target: 滋养猎狼

trans-unit.resname: J22·662 | Flourishing Hunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to the greatest toughness among other creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控之其他生物中的最大防御力。

trans-unit.source: "I would welcome her into my pack with honor."\n—Arlinn Kord
trans-unit.target: 「她倘愿加入我的狼群，便是我莫大荣耀。」 ～雅琳珂德

trans-unit.target: 威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Each bronze disk on its harness is an offering from a young Temur hunter, a sign of respect to the spirits of the wild.
trans-unit.target: 铁木尔年轻猎人将铜碟悬挂在乳齿象的挽具上，以此贡品敬拜荒野之灵。

trans-unit.source: Gaea's Protector
trans-unit.target: 盖亚守护者

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME must be blocked if able.
trans-unit.target: 若能阻挡CARDNAME，则必须阻挡之。

trans-unit.source: Fallen Phyrexians were transmuted into elementals by Gaea long ago, but Yavimaya's other inhabitants still regard them with unease.
trans-unit.target: 盖亚很早就已将非瑞克西亚死躯转化为可利用的元素，但亚维马雅的其他居民仍无法安心接纳。

trans-unit.target: {2}{G}：目标由你操控的生物本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.
trans-unit.target: 观展的人们惊喜地发现，即便是出了展区，吉拉波这座城市也处处充满神奇。

trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张生物牌和／或一张地牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: J22·668 | Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You don't want to know how she got that name.
trans-unit.target: 你不会想知道她因何得名。

trans-unit.target: 土地暴涌

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.\nLandfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。 地落～如果本回合中有地在你的操控下进战场，则改为该生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "This world will not be tamed."
trans-unit.target: 「这世界绝不会驯服。」

trans-unit.source: Flash\nTrample
trans-unit.target: 闪现 践踏

trans-unit.source: Time rifts bring tunneling beasts of old into the hard, dry earth of the present. Most die there, trapped, but the mightiest burst through the surface.
trans-unit.target: 时间裂缝将古代野兽拉到现代的硬厚枯干土壤中。大多数不是死掉便是受困其间，只有最强力的才得以破土而出。

trans-unit.target: 掘穴（你于施放此咒语时每从你坟墓场中放逐一张牌，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 践踏

trans-unit.source: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.
trans-unit.target: 擅闯苏勒台领地者，最终往往会被拿去喂鳄鱼或逗狒狒。

trans-unit.source:
Flash
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature is a Wolf or Werewolf, untap that creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，若所结附的生物是狼或狼人，则重置该生物。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.target: 长嚎游魂

trans-unit.source: Creatures with power less than CARDNAME's power can't block it.\nUndying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 力量小于CARDNAME的生物不能阻挡它。 不息（当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nMorbid — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为在该生物上放置三个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·674 | Hunger of the Howlpack | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Werewolves are an unholy mix of a predator's instinct and a human's hatred."\n—Alena, trapper of Kessig
trans-unit.target: 「狼人是掠食者本能与人类恨意的邪恶混合。」 ～凯锡革布陷人阿雷娜

trans-unit.target: 猎者显威

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

trans-unit.source: The hunt ends. Lunch begins.
trans-unit.target: 狩猎结束，午餐开始。

trans-unit.source: Ilysian Caryatid
trans-unit.target: 依吕夏女像柱

trans-unit.resname: J22·676 | Ilysian Caryatid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add two mana of any one color instead.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则改为加两点任意颜色的单色法术力。

trans-unit.source: Those who die as heroes are permitted to dwell in Ilysia, a protected realm of the Underworld as tranquil and vibrant as the rest is bleak.
trans-unit.target: 被尊为英雄者死后可进入安宁兴盛的依吕夏境内。此处为少有的安全境域，与冥界他处的黑暗阴沉形成鲜明对比。

trans-unit.source: Imperious Perfect
trans-unit.target: 骄傲至美

trans-unit.source: Other Elves you control get +1/+1.\n{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他妖精得+1/+1。 {G}，{T}：派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.
trans-unit.target: 在美感的文化中，会将最美丽者崇敬如神。

trans-unit.source: Iridescent Hornbeetle
trans-unit.target: 虹彩角虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·678 | Iridescent Hornbeetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: The hatchlings will fill the jungles of Murasa in a glittering tide.
trans-unit.target: 其幼虫会让整个姆拉撒丛林色彩斑斓。

trans-unit.target: 铁壳甲虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·679 | Ironshell Beetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Please don't feed the beetles."\n—Promenade warning sign
trans-unit.target: 「禁止喂食甲虫。」 ～步道警示牌

trans-unit.resname: J22·680 | Ivy Lane Denizen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."
trans-unit.target: 「空骑士的装备？我有龙兽皮护手，柔韧防火。或是一件能挡住弩箭的角龙胸甲。」

trans-unit.source: Kessig Cagebreakers
trans-unit.target: 凯锡革破栅客

trans-unit.resname: J22·681 | Kessig Cagebreakers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token that's tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，便派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."
trans-unit.target: 「他们用栅栏囚禁这些高贵野兽，却不晓得为何狼人要针对我们的城镇攻击。」

trans-unit.target: 朽力～当CARDNAME进战场时，你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.\n—Kraul saying
trans-unit.target: 以粮为食，终成腐尸。以腐为食，必得永生。 ～刻洛谚语

trans-unit.source: Reach\nUndergrowth — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature with flying you don't control. CARDNAME gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have CARDNAME fight that creature.
trans-unit.target: 延势 朽力～当CARDNAME进战场时，选择至多一个目标不由你操控且具飞行异能的生物。CARDNAME得+X/+0直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量，然后你可以使CARDNAME与该生物互斗。

trans-unit.target: {5}{G}：CARDNAME得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.
trans-unit.target: 虫型的刻洛族潜伏在街道下的隧道。许多都效忠葛加理群落，其他则按照自己的神秘阶级制度过活。

trans-unit.source: Kujar Seedsculptor
trans-unit.target: 库贾塑碧匠

trans-unit.resname: J22·685 | Kujar Seedsculptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Every leaf, tree, and building in Kujar has been placed to achieve maximum harmony, in accordance with the elvish philosophy known as the Great Conduit.
trans-unit.target: 库贾的每片叶子，每棵树和每栋建筑都依称为大通联的妖精哲学安排，达到完美和谐。

trans-unit.resname: J22·686 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lys Alana Huntmaster
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那领猎人

trans-unit.resname: J22·686 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放妖精咒语时，你可以派出一个1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: J22·686 | Lys Alana Huntmaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.
trans-unit.target: 从晓明殿最高的一层，直到蒙鸠地最暗的阴影，此号角的银色音符在空气中闪烁，让听闻者都为之牵动。

trans-unit.source: Mammoth Spider
trans-unit.target: 庞巨蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: J22·687 | Mammoth Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach
trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.source: "If a careless elf ends up caught in a spider's web, we must expect nature to take its course. Do not blame the spider for being a spider."\n—Dellin Berting, Tolarian entomologist
trans-unit.target: 「如果见到粗心妖精误困蛛网，我们只能让他听天由命。切勿怪罪蜘蛛遵从本性。」 ～陶拉里亚昆虫学家德林博汀

trans-unit.resname: J22·688 | Master of the Wild Hunt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Master of the Wild Hunt
trans-unit.target: 幽猎领袖

trans-unit.resname: J22·688 | Master of the Wild Hunt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.\n{T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。 {T}：横置所有由你操控且未横置的狼生物。每个以此法横置的狼各对目标生物造成等同于前者力量的伤害。该生物对这些狼中的任意数量造成总共等同于该生物力量的伤害，其操控者可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: Master's Rebuke
trans-unit.target: 蛇圣拒斥

trans-unit.resname: J22·689 | Master's Rebuke | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.source: "You have always been a promising student, but your arrogance far outstrips your prowess."
trans-unit.target: 「为师一直深觉你前途无量，但你孤高倨傲定会自缚手脚。」

trans-unit.resname: J22·690 | Might of the Masses | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Might of the Masses
trans-unit.target: 众人之力

trans-unit.resname: J22·690 | Might of the Masses | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个生物，目标生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: J22·690 | Might of the Masses | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There is nothing stronger than many hearts united for a single cause."\n—Emmara
trans-unit.target: 「众人齐心，其利断金。」 ～艾玛拉

trans-unit.source: Moldgraf Millipede
trans-unit.target: 苔墓千足虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·691 | Moldgraf Millipede | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME for each creature card in your graveyard. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌，然后你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: Between stitchers, cultists, and scavengers, corpses are in high demand.
trans-unit.target: 拼接师、教众、食腐兽，在多方争抢下，如今尸体需求旺盛。

trans-unit.source: Moonlight Hunt
trans-unit.target: 月光猎杀

trans-unit.resname: J22·692 | Moonlight Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target creature you don't control. Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标不由你操控的生物。每个由你操控且为狼或狼人的生物各依本身力量对该生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: Courage alone won't keep you alive.
trans-unit.target: 单凭勇气无法保命。

trans-unit.source: Naga Vitalist
trans-unit.target: 活力那伽

trans-unit.resname: J22·693 | Naga Vitalist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其类别为由你操控的地能产生之任一类别。

trans-unit.source: "The lands of the God-Pharaoh are suffused with his breath."
trans-unit.target: 「法老神的土地上也弥漫着法老神的吐息。」

trans-unit.source: Nantuko Cultivator
trans-unit.target: 耕耘螳人

trans-unit.resname: J22·694 | Nantuko Cultivator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME and draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以弃任意数量的地牌。在CARDNAME上放置等量的+1/+1指示物且抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.source: "Every seed holds strength and teaches patience."
trans-unit.target: 「每颗种子都蕴含力量，教导耐心。」

trans-unit.source: Nessian Hornbeetle
trans-unit.target: 奈西安角虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·695 | Nessian Hornbeetle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控另一个力量等于或大于4的生物，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "The first rule of politics can be learned from a lowly hornbeetle: it is wise to cultivate powerful friends."\n—Pythamon, sage of Meletis
trans-unit.target: 「我们可以从弱小的角虫处领悟到政治学的首要准则：培养一位强力的同伴。」 ～迈勒提斯智者皮塔摩恩

trans-unit.source: Nightpack Ambusher
trans-unit.target: 夜群袭狼

trans-unit.resname: J22·696 | Nightpack Ambusher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nOther Wolves and Werewolves you control get +1/+1.\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you didn't cast a spell this turn, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 由你操控的其他狼和狼人得+1/+1。 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中你未施放过咒语，则派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: A strong leader means a growing pack.
trans-unit.target: 头狼凶狠，意味狼群得以壮大。

trans-unit.source: Oashra Cultivator
trans-unit.target: 欧夏拉耕者

trans-unit.resname: J22·697 | Oashra Cultivator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Like fruits in the field, we will be harvested when the season is right."
trans-unit.target: 「我们跟田地里的水果一样，到了收获季节就会被采摘。」

trans-unit.source: Ondu Giant
trans-unit.target: 昂度巨人

trans-unit.resname: J22·698 | Ondu Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.
trans-unit.target: 有些德鲁伊照料庭园。其他的则照料大陆。

trans-unit.resname: J22·699 | Ordeal of Nylea | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ordeal of Nylea
trans-unit.target: 倪勒娅的试炼

trans-unit.resname: J22·699 | Ordeal of Nylea | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice CARDNAME.\nWhen you sacrifice CARDNAME, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物攻击时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后若其上有三个或更多+1/+1指示物，则牺牲CARDNAME。 当你牺牲CARDNAME时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Ornery Dilophosaur
trans-unit.target: 暴躁双冠龙

trans-unit.resname: J22·700 | Ornery Dilophosaur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Overcome
trans-unit.target: 压袭

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+2/+2且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: "Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"\n—Khemses, charioteer
trans-unit.target: 「前进！拿下地平线！」 ～御夫凯齐兹

trans-unit.source: Overgrowth
trans-unit.target: 过度生长

trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nWhenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 每当横置所结附的地以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加{G}{G}。

trans-unit.source: "Let the forest spread! From salt, stone, and fen, let the new trees rise."\n—Molimo, maro-sorcerer
trans-unit.target: 「就让树林蔓延！不论盐地，枯石，沼泽，都会挺立起树苗。」 ～玛洛术士莫黎墨

trans-unit.source: Packsong Pup
trans-unit.target: 唤群幼狼

trans-unit.resname: J22·703 | Packsong Pup | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another Wolf or Werewolf, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you gain life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控另一个狼或狼人，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，你获得等同于其力量的生命。

trans-unit.source: A wolf pup is always dangerous, because a wolf pup is never alone.
trans-unit.target: 单头幼狼是危险讯号，因为幼狼总不落单。

trans-unit.source: Paradise Druid
trans-unit.target: 天堂德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: J22·704 | Paradise Druid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has hexproof as long as it's untapped.(It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME未横置，它便具有辟邪异能。（它不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。） {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."
trans-unit.target: 「世上有许多使命，我的使命就是照管世界，令其茁壮长存。」

trans-unit.source: Pestilent Wolf
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫狼

trans-unit.source: {2}{G}: CARDNAME gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}：CARDNAME获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Wolves that feast on zombie flesh and survive carry the foul diseases of the dead wherever they roam.
trans-unit.target: 吃过灵俑而幸存的狼群，会将亡者腐疫播散到它们所经之处。

trans-unit.source: Phantom Nantuko
trans-unit.target: 幽魅螳人

trans-unit.source:
Trample
CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 如果CARDNAME将受到伤害，则防止该伤害。从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Pounce

trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

trans-unit.source: The drive to hunt and feed is raw instinct for dinosaurs. The trick is simply to channel it in the right direction.
trans-unit.target: 恐龙捕猎进食乃是纯粹本能。诀窍在于指引它扑向正确的方向。

trans-unit.source: Predator's Howl
trans-unit.target: 掠食者嚎叫

trans-unit.resname: J22·708 | Predator's Howl | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.\nMorbid — Create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为派出三个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "And Muzzio says my arguments have no teeth."\n—Selvala, ranger of the Lowlands
trans-unit.target: 「穆奇奥竟说我的论据还不够尖锐。」 ～下城护林者塞瓦拉

trans-unit.source: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."
trans-unit.target: 「刚德，塔德温华域的英雄，在此长眠。愿他永远领导我们的探索。」

trans-unit.source: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters."\n—Paulin, trapper of Somberwald
trans-unit.target: 「你不会见到太多年老的狼人猎手。」 ～松柏森布陷人堡霖

trans-unit.source: Pridemalkin
trans-unit.target: 高傲斑猫

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.\nEach creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.target: 原初多头龙

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.\nCARDNAME has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。 在你的维持开始时，将CARDNAME上的+1/+1指示物数量加倍。 只要CARDNAME上有十个或更多+1/+1指示物，它便具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.target: 觅食蛇豹

trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.\nCreature spells you control can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 由你操控的生物咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.source: The viziers serving Rhonas, the god of strength, maintain the menagerie of animals employed during his trial.
trans-unit.target: 侍奉力量之神罗纳斯的维齐尔负责饲养会在祀炼中出现的各类猛兽。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "The ruin of the past is the topsoil of the future."\n—Sokar, former Nef-crop initiate
trans-unit.target: 「过往遗迹奠定未来基础。」 ～原奈法祀群祀徒索卡

trans-unit.target: 莽闯巴洛西

trans-unit.target: 践踏 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以派出一个4/4绿色野兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "When the land is angry, so are they."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「当大地发怒，它们也闹脾气。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.target: 鲁莽增术师

trans-unit.target: {4}{G}：将CARDNAME的力量与防御力加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Linear growth? What am I, a first-year?"
trans-unit.target: 「线性增长？你当我还是一年级新生吗？」

trans-unit.source: Reclamation Sage
trans-unit.target: 复碧智者

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."
trans-unit.target: 「无论是由石匠塑造，由铁匠锻造，或由法师赐予生命者，我都会让它们重归大地怀抱。」

trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以将其中一张生物牌和／或一张地牌置于你手上。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Calix was patient, steadily following Elspeth until their destined confrontation.
trans-unit.target: 凯利斯不急不躁，他一直暗中跟踪艾紫培的动向，直到宿命的交锋时刻。

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch, indestructible\nCARDNAME can't attack or block unless you control another creature with power 4 or greater.\n{2}{G}: Another target creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触，不灭 除非你操控另一个力量等于或大于4的生物，否则CARDNAME不能进行攻击或阻挡。 {2}{G}：直到回合结束，另一个目标生物得+2/+0且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: J22·720 | Roar of Challenge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roar of Challenge
trans-unit.target: 挑战之吼

trans-unit.resname: J22·720 | Roar of Challenge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.\nFerocious — That creature gains indestructible until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，所有能阻挡目标生物的生物皆须阻挡之。 威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则该目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·721 | Roots of Wisdom | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 智慧缠根

trans-unit.resname: J22·721 | Roots of Wisdom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mill three cards, then return a land card or Elf card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 磨三张牌，然后将一张地牌或妖精牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。如果你无法如此作，则抓一张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·721 | Roots of Wisdom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though imprisoned in Jaspera trees, the elvish gods known as the Einir still whisper through the ages.
trans-unit.target: 虽然称作埃尼尔神族的妖精古神被禁锢在雅斯佩树中，但他们的低语依旧能穿越时代。

trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物互斗。 威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则该目标由你操控的生物在互斗前得+2/+2直到回合结束。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）

trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. You gain 2 life. You may play an additional land this turn.\nDraw a card.

trans-unit.source: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为CARDNAME上的+1/+1指示物数量。

trans-unit.source: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅的猿猴从先祖灵魂中汲取力量。

trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便得+0/+2。

trans-unit.target: 长在这种狼毛当中的蘑菇具有奇妙疗效，吸引众多炼金术士甘愿拼死追猎。

trans-unit.source: As the Eldrazi adapted to the jungles of Zendikar, some took on the tactics of more familiar predators.
trans-unit.target: 随着对赞迪卡丛林的适应，一部分奥札奇采用了类似掠食者所用的策略。

trans-unit.source: "The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide."\n—*Tales of the Fae*

trans-unit.source: "We'll break their lines. The rest of you, follow!"

trans-unit.source: The Ulvenwald makes no allowances for youth. Today's newborn is either tomorrow's hunter or tomorrow's lunch.

trans-unit.source: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「我错了。赞迪卡找上的不是我。它根本没找上任何人。它并不邪恶，也不怀怨仇。它壮丽非凡…却饱受痛苦。」 ～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.resname: J22·756 | Bag of Holding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There's no prepared like overprepared.

trans-unit.source: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

trans-unit.source: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控之永久物的触发式异能因神器或生物进战场而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.source: All who listen hear their own song, a unique melody played just for them.
trans-unit.target: 听者各闻心中悦音，独特旋律为其特别奏响。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Ironfoot
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚千斤脚

trans-unit.resname: J22·789 | Phyrexian Ironfoot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.\n{1}{S}: Untap CARDNAME. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。 {1}{S}：重置CARDNAME。（{S}能以产自雪境来源的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature—it just wasn't interested in moving.
trans-unit.target: 霜风会众花了好几天才明白，原来自己早就成功起动这生物～它只是不爱动。

trans-unit.source: Pierce Strider
trans-unit.target: 穿刺神行客

trans-unit.resname: J22·790 | Pierce Strider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「痛苦并非负面的刺激。痛苦是你未臻完美的讯号。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Pilgrim's Eye
trans-unit.target: 朝圣客之眼

trans-unit.resname: J22·791 | Pilgrim's Eye | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.
trans-unit.target: 寇族派出振翼机升空，打量这块大地是否有意愿接纳他们。

trans-unit.source: Psychosis Crawler
trans-unit.target: 变态爬虫

trans-unit.resname: J22·792 | Psychosis Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.\nWhenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的手牌数量。 每当你抓一张牌时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."\n—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur
trans-unit.target: 「如果那脑子无法理解浆液的秘密，就多加几个脑子。」 ～卜算手信众卢米

trans-unit.source: Raiders' Karve
trans-unit.target: 劫掠者卡筏

trans-unit.resname: J22·793 | Raiders' Karve | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.\nCrew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之横置放进战场。 搭载3（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.source: Runed Servitor
trans-unit.target: 符文随侍

trans-unit.resname: J22·794 | Runed Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
trans-unit.target: 塔帖立遗迹让学者思索数百年却找不到解答。其秘密一直就躲在个刻着符文的头里面。

trans-unit.source: Self-Assembler

trans-unit.source: It sees itself in all of its creations.
trans-unit.target: 它的所有造物中都留有自身影子。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量等同于由你操控之神器和／或结界的总数量。

trans-unit.source: "The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「咔嚓作响的陌生人忽然出现，年轻的扈从握紧利剑。前来挑战她的根本就不是骑士。」 ～*《圆石阵奇谭》*

trans-unit.source: Solemn Simulacrum

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact."\n—Sargis Haz, artificer
trans-unit.target: 「这世界已经靠各种机械来运作着。有一天，它们会提醒我们这事实。」 ～神器师莎琪亥

trans-unit.target: 每当一个CARDNAME以外由你操控的来源向任一对手造成伤害时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {X}，{T}，从CARDNAME上移去X个充电指示物：它对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Tamiyo's Journal
trans-unit.target: 多美代的札记

trans-unit.resname: J22·800 | Tamiyo's Journal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")\n{T}, Sacrifice three Clues: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。） {T}，牺牲三个线索：从你牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手将其手牌以任意顺序置于其牌库底，然后抓等量的牌。（该牌手先抓该回合要抓的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: J22·835 | Kibo, Uktabi Prince | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Each player creates a colorless artifact token named Banana with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {R} or {G}. You gain 2 life."\nWhenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that's an Ape or a Monkey.\nWhenever Kibo attacks, defending player sacrifices an artifact.
trans-unit.target: {T}：每位牌手各派出一个无色，名称为香蕉的衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加{R}或{G}。你获得2点生命。」 每当一个由对手操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，在每个由你操控且为猿猴或猴的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当奇博攻击时，防御牌手牺牲一个神器。
